tika-s0519t:10_2: taṃ sammadeva tesaṃ uggahaṇadhāraṇādikkamaladdhabbāya sammāpaṭipattiyā sabbahitasukhanipphādanatthaṃ.
tika-s0519t:10_6: āyatiṃ paresaṃ diṭṭhānugatiāpajjanato ca saṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ ratanattayapaṇāmakiriyā.
tika-s0519t:10_14: Vatthuttayapūjā hi niratisayapuññakkhettasambuddhiyā aparimeyyappabhāvo puññātisayoti bahuvidhantarāyepi
tika-s0519t:11_0: “Pūjārahe pūjayato, buddhe yadi va sāvake”ti. ca,
tika-s0519t:13_0: “Ye, bhikkhave, buddhe pasannā, agge te pasannā, agge kho pana pasannānaṃ aggo vipāko hotī”ti ca,
tika-s0519t:16_0: Varameva hi sā pīti, kasiṇenapi jambudīpassa;
tika-s0519t:19_2: nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti,
tika-s0519t:22_0: Bhayaṃ vā chambhitattaṃ vā, lomahaṃso na hessatī”ti. ca;
tika-s0519t:23_3: vandanārahe ca katā vandanā yathādhippetappayojanaṃ sādhetīti.
tika-s0519t:23_7: Tathā hi suttantadesanā na vinayadesanā viya karuṇāppadhānā,
tika-s0519t:23_9: atha kho karuṇāpaññāppadhānāti tadubhayappadhānadesanāvisesavibhāvanaṃ tāva sammāsambuddhassa thomanaṃ
tika-s0519t:24_3: paradukkhe sati kāruṇikaṃ hiṃsati vibādhatīti attho.
tika-s0519t:24_5: paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ hadayakhedaṃ karotīti attho.
tika-s0519t:24_9: attasukhanirapekkhatāya kāruṇikānaṃ sukhaṃ rundhati vibandhatīti attho.
tika-s0519t:24_12: Yathā hi dvāraṭṭhānato aññattha vattamānopi dvārapaṭibaddhajīviko puriso dvārānativattavuttitāya dvāre niyuttoti “dovāriko”ti vuccati,
tika-s0519t:24_13: evaṃ bhagavā mettādivasena karuṇāvihārato aññattha vattamānopi karuṇānativattavuttitāya karuṇāya niyuttoti “kāruṇiko”ti vuccati.
tika-s0519t:24_14: Mahābhinīhārato paṭṭhāya hi yāva mahāparinibbānā lokahitatthameva lokanāthā tiṭṭhantīti.
tika-s0519t:24_16: Satipi bhagavato tadaññaguṇānampi vasena mahantabhāve kāruṇikasaddasannidhānena vuttattā karuṇāvasenevettha
tika-s0519t:24_18: Evañca katvā “mahākāruṇiko”ti iminā padena puggalādhiṭṭhānena satthu mahākaruṇā vuttā hoti.
tika-s0519t:25_1: atthasādhanato karuṇaṃ karuṇāyanaṃ karuṇāsampavattanaṃ arahatīti kāruṇiko.
tika-s0519t:25_2: Bhagavato hi sabbaññutāya anavasesato sattānaṃ hitaṃ,
tika-s0519t:25_6: Atha vā karuṇā karuṇāyanaṃ sīlaṃ pakati sabhāvo etassāti kāruṇiko.
tika-s0519t:25_7: Bhagavā hi pathavīphassādayo viya kakkhaḷaphusanādisabhāvā karuṇāsabhāvo sabhāvabhūtakaruṇoti attho.
tika-s0519t:25_12: Bhagavato hi karuṇā niravasesesu sattesu pavattati,
tika-s0519t:25_14: diṭṭhadhammikādibhedañca mahantameva sattānaṃ hitasukhaṃ ekantato nipphādeti,
tika-s0519t:26_4: Atha vā nāthati veneyyagataṃ kilesabyasanaṃ upatāpetīti nātho,
tika-s0519t:26_9: bhikkhu kālena kālaṃ attasampattiṃ paccavekkhitā”tiādinā sattānaṃ taṃ taṃ hitappaṭipattiṃ yācitvāpi mahākaruṇāya samussāhito te tattha niyojeti.
tika-s0519t:26_11: sabbasatte vā sīlādiguṇehi īsati abhibhavatīti paramissaro bhagavā “nātho”ti vuccati,
tika-s0519t:27_4: patitapatitānaṃ attano puthulagambhīrabhāvehi saṃsīdanaṃ nimmujjanaṃ karotīti attho. Saṃ-
tika-s0519t:27_9: imaṃ velaṃ nātikkamāmī”ti lokena saṅgaraṃ saṅketaṃ karonto viya hotīti attho.
tika-s0519t:27_10: Saṅgaraṇaṃ vā samantato galanaṃ sandanaṃ udakena karotīti sāgaro.
tika-s0519t:27_11: Kappavuṭṭhānakāle hi mahāsamuddo ito cito ca paggharitvā sakalaṃ lokadhātuṃ ekoghaṃ karotīti.
tika-s0519t:27_12: Lokiyā pana vadanti “sāgarassa rañño puttehi sāgarehi nibbattito khatoti sāgaro,
tika-s0519t:27_14: taṃsambandhatāya ruḷhivasena sabbopi samuddo tathā voharīyatī”ti.
tika-s0519t:27_19: Tathā hi ñeyyasseva sātisayā puthulatā aparimāṇalokadhātubyāpanato,
tika-s0519t:27_23: na itarassa paricchinnadesattā bāhirakavītarāgehipi ittarena khaṇena atikkamitabbattā,
tika-s0519t:28_4: Tattha “kicchaṃ vatāyaṃ loko āpanno”tiādinā karuṇāyanavaseneva abhinivisitvā anekākāravokāre saṅkhāre
tika-s0519t:28_5: sammasantaṃ bhagavato sammasanañāṇaṃ chattiṃsakoṭisatasahassamukhena ñeyyasāgaraṃ ajjhogāhetvā tassa
tika-s0519t:29_4: ekattādibhedato nandiyāvaṭṭādivibhāgato ca vicitrā visiṭṭhā nānāvidhā nayā etissāti nipuṇagambhīravicitranayā,
tika-s0519t:30_0: Tattha dvīhākārehi bhagavato thomanā veditabbā attahitasampattito,
tika-s0519t:30_3: savāsanānaṃ sabbesaṃ kilesānaṃ accantappahānato ca veditabbā,
tika-s0519t:30_9: yathāvuttabhedā duvidhā ca attahitasampatti pakāsitā hoti. Kathaṃ?
tika-s0519t:30_13: “nātha”nti iminā pana ubhayathāpi bhagavato parahitappaṭipatti pakāsitā karuṇākiccadīpanato,
tika-s0519t:31_0: Atha vā tīhākārehi bhagavato thomanā veditabbā hetuto, phalato,
tika-s0519t:31_4: Phalaṃ catubbidhaṃ ñāṇasampadā pahānasampadā ānubhāvasampadā rūpakāyasampadā cāti.
tika-s0519t:31_5: Tāsu padhānabhūtā ñāṇapahānasampadā “ñeyyasāgarapāragu”nti iminā padena pakāsitā.
tika-s0519t:31_6: Padhāne hi dassite avinābhāvato itarampi dvayaṃ dassitameva hoti.
tika-s0519t:31_7: Na hi buddhānaṃ ānubhāvarūpakāyasampattīhi vinā kadācipi dhammakāyasirī vattatīti.
tika-s0519t:31_8: Upakāro anantaraṃ abāhiraṃ katvā tividhayānamukhena vimuttidhammadesanā,
tika-s0519t:32_1: Mahākaruṇāsañcoditamānaso hi bhagavā saṃsārapaṅkato sattānaṃ samuddharaṇatthaṃ katābhinīhāro anupubbena
tika-s0519t:32_2: pāramiyo pūretvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ adhigatoti karuṇā sammāsambodhiyā mūlaṃ.
tika-s0519t:32_6: Vuttappabhedaṃ pana sammasanañāṇaṃ saha paññāpāramiyā tassā pubbabhāgapaṭipadā.
tika-s0519t:32_10: Tathā hi sabbānatthaparihārapubbaṅgamāya niravasesahitasukhavidhānatapparāya niratisayāya payogasampattiyā,
tika-s0519t:32_12: bhagavā aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ anuttaragāravaṭṭhānabhūtatāya ca “nātho”ti vuccatīti.
tika-s0519t:32_18: itarehi attahitasampattīti tadubhayena attahitāya paṭipannādīsu catūsu puggalesu bhagavato catutthapuggalabhāvaṃ dīpeti,
tika-s0519t:33_0: Ettha ca yathā “mahākāruṇika”nti iminā padena bhagavato mahākaruṇā dassitā,
tika-s0519t:33_2: Tesu karuṇāggahaṇena lokiyesu mahaggatabhāvappattāsādhāraṇaguṇadīpanato bhagavato sabbalokiyaguṇasampatti dassitā hoti,
tika-s0519t:33_7: Tathā karuṇāggahaṇena lokasamaññānurūpaṃ bhagavato pavattiṃ dasseti lokavohāravisayattā karuṇāya,
tika-s0519t:33_9: Sabhāvānavabodhena hi dhammānaṃ samaññaṃ atidhāvitvā sattādisammasanaṃ hotīti.
tika-s0519t:33_22: catucattālīsa ñāṇavatthūni sattasattati ñāṇavatthūnīti evamādīnaṃ anekesaṃ paññāppabhedānaṃ vasena ñāṇacāraṃ dasseti.
tika-s0519t:34_18: iti ādipariyosānadassanena sabbe buddhaguṇā dassitā honti.
tika-s0519t:34_19: Tathā karuṇāvacanena sīlakkhandhapubbaṅgamo samādhikkhandho dassito hoti.
tika-s0519t:34_25: paññā pariyosānanti evampi ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇā sabbe buddhaguṇā dassitā honti nayato dassitattā.
tika-s0519t:34_26: Eso eva hi niravasesato buddhaguṇānaṃ dassanupāyo,
tika-s0519t:34_28: aññathā ko nāma samattho bhagavato guṇe anupadaṃ niravasesato dassetuṃ.
tika-s0519t:35_0: “Buddhopi buddhassa bhaṇeyya vaṇṇaṃ, kappampi ce aññamabhāsamāno;
tika-s0519t:36_0: Khīyetha kappo ciradīghamantare, vaṇṇo na khīyetha tathāgatassā”ti. ;
tika-s0519t:37_0: Teneva ca āyasmatā sāriputtattherenāpi buddhaguṇaparicchedanaṃ pati anuyuttena “no hetaṃ,
tika-s0519t:38_0: Evaṃ saṅkhepena sakalasabbaññuguṇehi bhagavantaṃ abhitthavitvā idāni saddhammaṃ thometuṃ “vijjācaraṇasampannā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0519t:38_5: catunnaṃ vā ariyasaccānaṃ viditakaraṇaṭṭhena vijjāti evaṃ tāvettha vacanatthato vijjā veditabbā.
tika-s0519t:38_6: Pabhedato pana tissopi vijjā vijjā bhayabheravasutte āgataniyāmeneva,
tika-s0519t:38_11: imehi ca caraṇehi sampannā sampannāgatāti vijjācaraṇasampannā.
tika-s0519t:39_7: “Tāya saddhāya avūpasantāyā”ti vacanato maggena samucchinnānaṃ kilesānaṃ paṭippassaddhippahānakiccatāya phalassa niyyānānuguṇatā,
tika-s0519t:39_8: niyyānapariyosānatā cāti iminā pariyāyena siyā karaṇattho niyyānakiriyāya.
tika-s0519t:39_10: Evañca katvā aggappasādasuttādīsu aggādibhāvena aggahitāpi phalapariyattidhammā chattamāṇavakavimānādīsu
tika-s0519t:39_11: saraṇīyabhāvena gahitāti tesaṃ magganibbānānaṃ viya mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ saraṇabhāvo uddhaṭo.
tika-s0519t:39_12: Visesato cettha maggapariyāpannā eva vijjācaraṇadhammā veditabbā.
tika-s0519t:39_13: Te hi nippariyāyena niyyānakiriyāya sādhakatamabhūtā, na itare.
tika-s0519t:39_17: Nāyaṃ virodho samānakālatāya eva adhippetattā yathā “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa”nti.
tika-s0519t:39_18: Sampannāti vā padassa vattamānakālatthatā veditabbā “uppannā dhammā”ti ettha uppannasaddassa viya.
tika-s0519t:39_19: Evañca katvā vacanasesamantareneva padayojanā siddhā hoti.
tika-s0519t:39_20: “Yenā”ti ca padaṃ ubhayattha sambandhitabbaṃ “yena dhammena vijjācaraṇasampannā,
tika-s0519t:40_4: Tathā hesa attanā uttaritarassa abhāvena “anuttaro”ti vuccati.
tika-s0519t:40_11: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”ti ādisuttapadānusārena vibhāvetabbo.
tika-s0519t:41_1: saṃsārato ca apatamāne katvā dhāretīti dhammo. Sammā,
tika-s0519t:41_4: tena yathā sammāsambodhisamadhigameneva sabbe buddhaguṇā sampāpuṇīyanti,
tika-s0519t:41_5: evaṃ sammadeva āsevanāya bhāvanāya bahulīkiriyāya sammāpaṭipattiyā sammadeva paccavekkhaṇāya sakkaccaṃ
tika-s0519t:43_1: abhitthavanena ca pūjito mānito apacitoti sammāsambuddhapūjito,
tika-s0519t:44_1: yassa dhammassa adhigamane vijjāsampannā ceva honti caraṇasampannā ca,
tika-s0519t:44_4: anavasesadukkhanissaraṇahetubhūtañca uttamaṃ pavaraṃ saddhiṃ pariyattidhammena navavidhaṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ
tika-s0519t:45_1: vijjācaraṇasampannā ca hontī”ti padadvayena yathākkamaṃ dhammassa bhāvetabbabhāvo,
tika-s0519t:45_23: Atha vā paṭhamena niyyānikabhāvadassanato svākkhātatāya dhammaṃ thometi,
tika-s0519t:46_0: “Uttama”nti ca etena aññassa visiṭṭhassa abhāvadīpanena paripuṇṇatāya dhammaṃ thometi,
tika-s0519t:46_8: Tathā bhāvetabbabhāvenassa saha pubbabhāgasīlādīhi sekkhā sīlasamādhipaññākkhandhā,
tika-s0519t:46_9: sacchikātabbabhāvena saha asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā asekkhā sīlasamādhipaññākkhandhā dassitā hontīti.
tika-s0519t:47_0: Evaṃ saṅkhepena sabbasaddhammaguṇehi saddhammaṃ thometvā idāni ariyasaṅghaṃ thometuṃ “sīlādiguṇasampanno”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:47_3: Ariyānañhi taṃtaṃmaggavajjhakilesappahānena hatapaṭipakkhā suvisuddhā sīlādayo “sampannā”ti vattabbataṃ arahanti,
tika-s0519t:47_7: Ariyapuggalānañhi ariyasaccappaṭivedhena saheva yathārahaṃ sekkhāsekkhā sīlādidhammakkhandhā pāripūriṃ gacchantīti.
tika-s0519t:48_0: Nanu ca ariyasaṅghe na sabbe ariyapuggalā maggaṭṭhā,
tika-s0519t:48_3: avayavadhammena pana samudāyaṃ niddisanto evamāha yathā “samaṃ cuṇṇa”nti.
tika-s0519t:48_4: Yathā hi yogacuṇṇassa avayavesu labbhamāno samabhāvo samudāye apadisīyati “samaṃ cuṇṇa”nti,
tika-s0519t:48_5: evaṃ ariyasaṅghassa avayavabhūtesu ariyapuggalesu labbhamāno maggaṭṭhaphalaṭṭhabhāvo samudāyabhūte ariyasaṅghe
tika-s0519t:49_5: ariyo ca so saṅgho cāti ariyasaṅgho,
tika-s0519t:49_7: Pujjabhavaphalanibbattanato attano santānaṃ punātīti vā puññaṃ,
tika-s0519t:49_8: khittaṃ vuttaṃ bījaṃ viruhanaṭṭhānatāya tāyati rakkhatīti khettaṃ kedārādi,
tika-s0519t:49_10: sattānaṃ puññassa mahapphalabhāvakaraṇena viruhanaṭṭhānatāya khettanti puññakkhettaṃ.
tika-s0519t:50_0: Ettha ca “sīlādiguṇasampanno”ti etena ariyasaṅghassa bhagavato anujātaputtataṃ dasseti,
tika-s0519t:50_7: “Puññakkhettaṃ anuttara”nti etena lokassa bahūpakārataṃ dasseti aggadakkhiṇeyyabhāvadīpanato.
tika-s0519t:51_6: “Sīlādiguṇasampanno”ti iminā panassa vihatavidhastakilesā anavasesā sekkhāsekkhā sīlādidhammakkhandhā dassitā.
tika-s0519t:51_7: “Ariyasaṅghaṃ puññakkhettaṃ anuttara”nti iminā tesaṃ tesaññeva yathāvuttaguṇavisesānaṃ suparisuddhataṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0519t:51_14: asekkhā sīlakkhandhādayo pariyosānanti ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇā sabbe ariyasaṅghaguṇā imāya gāthāya pakāsitāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:52_0: Evaṃ gāthāttayena saṅkhepato sakalaguṇasaṃkittanamukhena ratanattayassa paṇāmaṃ katvā idāni taṃ nipaccakāraṃ
tika-s0519t:55_0: Cittīkatabhāvādayo ca anaññasādhāraṇā buddhādīsu eva labbhanti,
tika-s0519t:55_5: ratanattayassa ca khettabhāvasampattiyā tassa puññassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanāya upaghātakaupaddavānaṃ vihanane samatthataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0519t:55_6: Sabbatthāti sabbasmiṃ anto ceva bahi ca,
tika-s0519t:55_12: Tassāti yaṃ ratanattaye vandanājanitaṃ puññaṃ, tassa.
tika-s0519t:56_0: Evaṃ ratanattayavandanāya payojanaṃ dassetvā idāni nettippakaraṇassa gambhīratthattā atthasaṃvaṇṇanāya dukkarabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “ṭhiti”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0519t:56_3: “ahovatāyaṃ saddhammanetti ciraṃ tiṭṭheyyā”ti evaṃ patthayantenāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0519t:56_7: Saddhammo hi veneyyasantānesu ariyaguṇānaṃ nayanato netti,
tika-s0519t:56_17: “karotu āyasmā nettippakaraṇassa kañci atthasaṃvaṇṇana”nti evaṃ nettiyā atthasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ pati ajjhesitoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0519t:56_18: Ettha ca saddhammassa ciraṃ ṭhitikāmena ajjhāsayasampannena sāsane thiraguṇayuttena sabrahmacārinā ādaragāravena,
tika-s0519t:56_19: abhimukhaṃ vā yācitena me na sakkā tassa abhiyācanaṃ paṭikkhipitunti dasseti “ṭhitiṃ ākaṅkhamānenā”ti gāthāya.
tika-s0519t:57_2: samantacakkhunā eva vā hatthatale ṭhapitaāmalakaṃ viya abhinīhāraṃ passantena.
tika-s0519t:58_2: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajantānaṃ yadidaṃ mahākaccāno”ti –
tika-s0519t:59_4: mahāsāvako ca so guṇavisesayogato uttamo cāti mahāsāvakuttamo.
tika-s0519t:60_1: ariyiddhivasena paramassa ca cetovasībhāvassa adhigatattā vasippatto.
tika-s0519t:60_7: mahākaccāno”tiādinā anekesu ṭhānesu bhagavatā pasaṃsitattā sambuddhena pasaṃsito.
tika-s0519t:61_4: Ekasmiṃ kira samaye ayaṃ mahāthero jambuvanasaṇḍe viharanto attano santikāvacarānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ imaṃ hāranayapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ pakaraṇaṃ abhāsi.
tika-s0519t:61_5: Bhāsitvā ca bhagavato santikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisinno yathābhāsitaṃ imaṃ pakaraṇaṃ bhagavato nivedesi.
tika-s0519t:61_8: imaṃ dhammasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ dhammanettitveva dhārehī”ti nāmaggahaṇaṃ akāsīti vadanti.
tika-s0519t:62_4: attano ca ñāṇassa nātivisayataṃ viditvā saṃvaṇṇanārambhe saṃsīdantampi maṃ sāsanaguṇādiupanissayasampadā
tika-s0519t:63_0: “Pañcapi nikāye ogāhetvā”ti iminā nettiyā pañcapi mahānikāye anupavisitvā avaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0519t:63_2: Tattha “katamo assādo ca ādīnavo cā”tiādipeṭakopadesapāḷiṃ ānetvā idha desanāhārādīnaṃ padatthavinicchayo peṭakena saṃsandanaṃ nāma.
tika-s0519t:63_3: “yathābala”nti iminā sabbathā sabbabhāgenāpi nettiyā saṃvaṇṇanā mayā na sukarā kātuṃ,
tika-s0519t:63_4: attano pana ñāṇabalānurūpaṃ karissāmīti niratimānataṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0519t:64_2: Asaṃkiṇṇanti sanikāyepi padatthantaraparikappanādinā asaṃkiṇṇaṃ tādisasaṅkararahitaṃ anākulaṃ suparicchinnaṃ.
tika-s0519t:64_6: nipuṇo sukhumo saṇho atthavinicchayo etassāti nipuṇatthavinicchayo.
tika-s0519t:64_15: siddhantaṃ taṃ avilomento anukūlato tattha siddhaṃyeva dhammanettiṃ pakāsayanto nettippakaraṇassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ karissāmīti.
tika-s0519t:65_0: Pamādalekhanti aparabhāge potthakāruḷhakāle pamajjitvā likhanavasena pavattappamādapāṭhaṃ.
tika-s0519t:65_2: Pāḷiṃ sammā niyojayanti taṃ taṃ nettipāḷiṃ tattha tattha udāharaṇabhāvena ānītasutte sammadeva niyojento,
tika-s0519t:65_3: atthasaṃvaṇṇanāya vā taṃ taṃ udāharaṇasuttasaṅkhātaṃ pāḷiṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ lakkhaṇabhūte nettiganthe sammadeva niyojento.
tika-s0519t:65_5: Yvāyaṃ sapaṭṭhānavibhāgassa tettiṃsavidhassa nettipadatthassa saha nimittavibhāgena asaṅkarato vavatthito visayo, taṃ.
tika-s0519t:66_0: Ettha ca “abhiyācito”ti iminā atthasaṃvaṇṇanāya nimittaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0519t:67_0: Idāni saṃvaṇṇanāya savane niyojento “iti attha”nti osānagāthamāha.
tika-s0519t:70_0: Vacanatthajānanena viditappakaraṇatthasāmaññatthassa pakaraṇakathā vuccamānā sobheyyāti nettipadatthaparijānanameva
tika-s0519t:70_1: ādimhi yuttarūpanti tadatthaṃ pucchati “tattha kenaṭṭhena nettī”ti.
tika-s0519t:70_2: Tattha tatthāti “tassā nettiyā karissāmatthavaṇṇana”nti yadidaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmiṃ;
tika-s0519t:70_5: Tatthāti vā “nettippakaraṇassā”ti etasmiṃ vacane yā netti vuttā,
tika-s0519t:70_8: tāva nettisaddassa atthaṃ vatvā idāni karaṇādhikaraṇasādhanavasena vattuṃ “nayanti tāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:71_0: Tathā hi vuttanti nettiupadesādhīnattā eva suttāvabodhassa vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:71_2: tattha pariyesanāya ayaṃ anupubbī bhavati soḷasa hārā pañca nayā aṭṭhārasa mūlapadānī”tiādi.
tika-s0519t:71_3: Hāranayavicāraṇā vinimutto atthasaṃvaṇṇanāviseso natthīti āha “suttassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanā nettiupadesāyattā”ti.
tika-s0519t:71_5: Evaṃ mahāvisayā cāyaṃ netti kuto pabhavāti āha “suttappabhavā”ti,
tika-s0519t:71_9: Thero hi pañca mahānikāye ogāhetvā taṃsannissayeneva tesaṃ saṃvaṇṇanābhūtaṃ imaṃ pakaraṇaṃ abhāsi,
tika-s0519t:72_3: Tīṇi hi etāni pakaraṇāni tayo adhikārā,
tika-s0519t:73_4: Puna “tathā hī”tiādinā tamevatthaṃ pāḷiyā pākaṭataraṃ karoti.
tika-s0519t:73_8: Tesu atthanayānaṃ aññamaññasaṅgaho parato āvi bhavissati.
tika-s0519t:73_13: Puññābhisaṅkhāro ca apuññābhisaṅkhāro ca kāyadvārappavatto kāyasaṅkhāro,
tika-s0519t:73_16: Iti jātivasena purimattike vuttā eva dhammā dvāravasena dutiyattike vuttā,
tika-s0519t:73_17: te eva ca purimattiketi aññamaññasaṅgaho veditabbo.
tika-s0519t:74_3: “Byañjanavidhiputhuttā”ti idaṃ ekasmiṃ sutte anekesaṃ hārānaṃ sannipatanassa kāraṇavacanaṃ.
tika-s0519t:75_0: “Na sarūpato”ti iminā saṅgahavāre viya uddesaniddesavāresupi paṭṭhānassa atthato uddhaṭataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0519t:75_1: Mūlapadaggahaṇeneva gahitattā uddesavāre tāva evaṃ hotu,
tika-s0519t:75_4: Na hi mūlapadehi vinā kāci nayayojanā sambhavati.
tika-s0519t:75_5: Apare pana “hāranayā viya paṭṭhānaṃ na suttassa saṃvaṇṇanāviseso,
tika-s0519t:75_6: atha kho tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sutte saṃkilesabhāgiyatādilabbhamānavisesamattanti na tassa pakaraṇassa padatthasaṅgaho.
tika-s0519t:75_7: Evañca katvā tettiṃsāya nettipadatthesu paṭṭhānaṃ asaṅgahitaṃ,
tika-s0519t:76_2: tena therena bhāsitabhāvo viya bhagavatā anumoditabhāvopi pāḷianugato evāti dasseti.
tika-s0519t:76_3: Sāvakabhāsitattā nidānaṃ na vuttanti na sakkā vattunti codento “sāvaka…pe…
tika-s0519t:76_6: nidānavacanassa ca akāraṇaṃ ubhayatthāpi ubhayassa dassanato.
tika-s0519t:76_7: Tasmā nidānāvacanena nettiyā asāvakabhāsitatā na sijjhatīti dasseti.
tika-s0519t:77_1: teneva kāraṇena imassa pakaraṇassa pamāṇabhāvasiddhīti dasseti “nidānañca nāmā”tiādinā.
tika-s0519t:77_3: Ayañhettha payogo na nettiyā nidānaṃ vattabbaṃ pāḷiyā atthasaṃvaṇṇanābhāvato.
tika-s0519t:77_4: Yā hi pāḷiyā atthasaṃvaṇṇanā na tassā nidānavacanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ yathā paṭisambhidāmaggassa,
tika-s0519t:78_1: tāva yathādassitassa pakaraṇavibhāgassa puna “ādinā nayena pakaraṇavibhāgo veditabbo”ti idaṃ nigamanaṃ.
tika-s0519t:78_2: Tattha ādinā nayenāti ādisaddena abhiññeyyadhammaniddesato paññattipaññapetabbadhammavibhajanato tiyaddhapariyāpannadhammavicārato
tika-s0519t:80_3: saddena parabhūtena saddapadatthako jāyatīti āha “yanti aniyamato upayoganiddeso”ti.
tika-s0519t:81_0: Evaṃ “ya”ntiādīnaṃ gāthāpadānaṃ kammakattukiriyākattuvisesanādidassanavasena atthaṃ vatvā idāni avayavajotanavasena
tika-s0519t:81_7: sumedhapaṇḍitattabhāvena pana pavattiṃ sandhāya vuttanti āha “yathāha bhagavā sumedhabhūto”ti.
tika-s0519t:82_3: Tathā ca vuttanti viññūhi vedanīyatāya eva sāsanavarassa vuttaṃ bhagavatā –
tika-s0519t:83_3: yathānusiṭṭhaṃ tathā paṭipajjamāno na cirasseva sāmaññeva ussati,
tika-s0519t:84_2: lokapālasaddo satthuvisayopi lokaṃ pati guṇībhūtoti “tassā”ti paṭiniddesassa kathaṃ satthuvisayatāti
tika-s0519t:84_4: guṇībhūtopi lokapālasaddo padhānabhūto viya paṭiniddesaṃ arahati.
tika-s0519t:85_0: Dhammagāravena bhagavā dhammaṃ pūjento veneyyabandhave acintetvā samāpattisamāpajjanadhammapaccavekkhaṇāhi
tika-s0519t:86_5: Āveṇikabuddhadhammādīti ettha ādisaddena tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇāni,
tika-s0519t:86_30: anantanayasamantapaṭṭhānapavicayadesanākārappavattañāṇāni cāti evamādīnaṃ bhagavato guṇavisesānaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0519t:87_2: sā ca guṇavisiṭṭhatā mahākaruṇāmahāpaññāhi veditabbā tāhi satthusampattisiddhito.
tika-s0519t:87_3: Tattha mahākaruṇāya pavattibhedo “bahukehi ākārehi passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā
tika-s0519t:87_21: paññāya sabbadhammesu virattacittatā pakāsitā hotīti anavasesato parahitapaṭipattiyā,
tika-s0519t:88_2: savanādīhi paricayakaraṇaṃ pariyattisāsanassāti tiṇṇampi vasena yojetabbo.
tika-s0519t:88_4: “Sakkaccaṃ dhammadesanenā”ti iminā idha “sāsana”nti vuttassa tividhassāpi saddhammassa avisesena desanāpūjaṃ
tika-s0519t:88_5: vatvā thomanāpūjanassa vasena taṃ vibhajitvā dassento “ariyaṃ,
tika-s0519t:88_8: Pūjanādvayassāpi vā vasena idhāpi padayojanā veditabbā.
tika-s0519t:89_0: Idāni ariyasaṅghaguṇānampi imāya gāthāya pakāsitabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “yasmā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:91_1: Tathā hi apare “therenevāyaṃ gāthā bhāsitā”ti vadanti.
tika-s0519t:91_2: Attūpanāyikāpi hi kadāci dhammadesanā hoti eva yathā “dasabalasamannāgato,
tika-s0519t:91_5: Evañca katvā “katame soḷasa hārā”tiādivacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0519t:92_1: Parato āgamissatīti niddesavārassa pariyosāne āgamissati “tīṇi ca nayā anūnā”tiādinā.
tika-s0519t:93_3: nayā cāti ubhayaṃ pariggahitaṃ saṃvaṇṇakena sabbathā gahitañce,
tika-s0519t:93_6: etena hāranayesu vasībhāvena suttasaṃvaṇṇanāya sukarataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0519t:94_3: Viññeyyatā visiṭṭhesu desanādesitesu viññeyyapade labbhamānā vijānanakiriyā.
tika-s0519t:95_0: Desanādesitāni ca yāvadeva vijānanatthānīti vijānanaṃ padhānanti tameva niddhārento “tatrāti tasmiṃ vijānane”ti āha.
tika-s0519t:96_0: Etthāhāti navaṅgasāsananavavidhasuttantāti etasmiṃ atthavacane āha codako.
tika-s0519t:96_3: tathā ca sati asuttasabhāvāneva geyyaṅgādīnīti navavidhasuttantavacanaṃ virujjheyya.
tika-s0519t:96_5: evaṃ sati “sutta”nti visuṃ suttaṅgaṃ na siyā,
tika-s0519t:96_13: niggāthakaṃ vāti aṅgadvayeneva tadubhayaṅgaṃ katanti visuṃ suttaṅgassa asambhavo tadubhayavinimuttassa suttassa abhāvato.
tika-s0519t:97_2: Codako “gāthāvirahe”ti vacanaṃ aggaṇhanto “pucchāvissajjanaṃ byākaraṇa”nti vacanamattameva gahetvā “evaṃ sante”tiādinā codeti.
tika-s0519t:97_3: Itaro pana okāsavidhito anokāso vidhi balavāti ñāyaṃ gāthāvirahitaṃyeva veyyākaraṇanti,
tika-s0519t:100_7: “Taṃ kiṃ maññathā”ti hi kā tumhākaṃ anumatīti anumati pucchitā.
tika-s0519t:101_1: saddassa atthaṃ vatvā sadisakappanāvasena dassetuṃ “hārā viyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:101_2: Puna ganthakaraṇādiatthena ganthādisaddānaṃ viya hārakaraṇādiatthena hārasaddasiddhiṃ dassetuṃ “hārayantī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0519t:101_4: ramaṇato cā”ti iminā manoharā manoramā cete saṃvaṇṇanāvisesāti dasseti.
tika-s0519t:102_1: Vuttanayenāti “nanu ca aññepi hārā yuttisahitā evā”tiādinā desanāhāre vuttanayānusārena.
tika-s0519t:103_0: Catunnaṃ byūho etthāti bhinnādhikaraṇānampi padānaṃ aññapadatthasamāso labbhati “urasilomo”tiādīnaṃ viyāti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:107_7: Na hi hetuphalānaṃ evaṃ hoti “ahaṃ imaṃ nibbattemi,
tika-s0519t:107_14: itarāpohe vā cittena katena tathā buddhi,
tika-s0519t:109_3: Yujjantīti ettha hetuattho antonīto veditabboti āha “yojīyantī”ti.
tika-s0519t:109_7: tehi samānayogakkhamā taggahaṇeneva gahitā hontīti attho tadekaṭṭhabhāvato.
tika-s0519t:114_3: somanassanti dvayena samānādhikaraṇanti katvā “assādīyatīti assādo, sukhaṃ,
tika-s0519t:114_5: Sukhādivedanā viya manāpiyarūpādipi avītarāgassa assādetabbanti āha “evaṃ iṭṭhārammaṇampī”ti.
tika-s0519t:114_9: yena hetunā pañcupādānakkhandhe paṭicca assādanīyabhāvena uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ,
tika-s0519t:114_11: Iti katvā ayamattho diṭṭhābhinandanādibhāvato vipallāsesupi sambhavatīti āha “evaṃ vipallāsāpī”ti.
tika-s0519t:114_14: anavasesā sāsavā dhammā idha ārammaṇaggahaṇena gahitāti āha “sabbesaṃ tebhūmakasaṅkhārāna”nti.
tika-s0519t:115_0: Dukkhādukkhamasukhavedanānanti ettha dukkhasabhāvā eva adukkhamasukhā vedanā gahitā aniṭṭhārammaṇassa adhippetattā,
tika-s0519t:115_4: santasmiṃ esā paṇīte sukhe vuttā bhagavatā”ti.
tika-s0519t:115_5: “Sukhapariyāyasabbhāvato”ti iminā iṭṭhatāmattatopi lesena sattānaṃ ārammaṇassa assādanīyatā sambhavatīti dasseti.
tika-s0519t:116_1: svāyaṃ pīḷanavuttiyā veditabboti āha “ādīnavo dukkhā vedanā,
tika-s0519t:116_3: Evaṃ dosatthataṃ ādīnavassa dassetvā idāni kapaṇatthataṃ dassetuṃ “atha vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:118_2: atha kho te ca saññībhavādayo ca ekavokārabhavādayo ca gahitā.
tika-s0519t:119_0: Yāvadeva anupādāparinibbānatthā bhagavato desanāti āha “nanu ca…pe…
tika-s0519t:119_4: “Paramparāyā”ti etena ajjhattaṃ yonisomanasikāro viya na paratoghoso āsannakāraṇaṃ dhammādhigamassa dhammassa paccattaṃ vedanīyattāti dasseti.
tika-s0519t:120_1: evaṃ maccutaro siyā”ti idaṃ ariyamaggassa pubbabhāgapaṭipadāya phalabhāvasādhanaṃ.
tika-s0519t:121_0: “Dhammo have”ti pana gāthāyaṃ lokiyassa puññaphalassa vuttattā āha “idaṃ phala”nti.
tika-s0519t:123_2: bhikkhu pañcannaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”tiādīsu.
tika-s0519t:124_3: Sutte āgataṃ na atthasaṃvaṇṇanāvasena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0519t:124_4: Pucchānurūpatā idha pubbāparanti catubyūhapubbāparato imaṃ visesetvā dasseti.
tika-s0519t:124_6: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana heṭṭhimadesanāya pucchānimittapavattauparidesanāya sambandho “pucchānusandhī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:124_8: “Suttassā”ti vā iminā pucchāvissajjanāanugītiyo ṭhapetvā seso vicayahārapadattho saṅgahitoti padassāpi saṅgaho veditabbo.
tika-s0519t:125_9: “Kiṃ panete kusalāti vā dhammāti vā ekatthā,
tika-s0519t:125_11: Vissajjanassa pana sāvasesatā veneyyajjhāsayavasena desanāyaṃ veditabbā.
tika-s0519t:126_0: Ettha ca assādo assādahetu yāva āṇattihetūti evaṃ hetūnampi assādādayo veditabbā.
tika-s0519t:127_6: Iti anupubbakathāya saddhiṃ buddhānaṃ sāmukkaṃsikāya dhammadesanāya niddhāraṇabhāvena vicayo veditabbo.
tika-s0519t:128_3: Vicayahārapadatthā eva hi yuttāyuttādivisesasahitā yuttihārādīnaṃ padatthā.
tika-s0519t:128_4: Tathā hi padaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānikabhāvavisiṭṭhā teyeva padaṭṭhānahārassa padatthā.
tika-s0519t:128_20: atthassa suttādīhi avilomanaṃ yuttabhāvo”ti iminā asabhāvaniruttitā,
tika-s0519t:129_4: Yāva sabbadhammāti ettha sabbaṃ nāma padesasabbaṃ,
tika-s0519t:129_6: Ayañhi sabbasaddo yathā paṭhamavikappe sutte āgatadhammavasena padesavisayo,
tika-s0519t:129_7: evaṃ dutiyavikappe padaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānikaniddhāraṇena taṃtaṃpakaraṇaparicchinnadhammaggahaṇato padesavisayo eva,
tika-s0519t:130_2: evaṃ ekarasaṭṭhena bhāvanā “ekuppādā”tiādīsu viya ekalakkhaṇāti ettha ekasaddo samānatthoti āha “samānalakkhaṇā”ti.
tika-s0519t:130_8: Saññāsahagatā hi dhammā tattha saññāggahaṇena gahitā.
tika-s0519t:130_10: Piyavacanatthacariyā samānattatāpi hi tattha mittaganthanakiccena samānakiccā gayhanti saṅgahavatthubhāvato.
tika-s0519t:130_13: evaṃ saññādīnampi sahajātādinā paccayo hoti evāti tepi samānahetutāya vuttā eva honti.
tika-s0519t:130_20: evaṃ taṇhupādādīnampīti tepi tattha gahitāva honti.
tika-s0519t:130_21: Tenāha “purimakammabhavasmiṃ moho avijjā āyūhanā saṅkhārā nikanti taṇhā upagamanaṃ upādāna”nti.
tika-s0519t:130_23: taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjatī”ti vutte taṃsampayuttā vedanādayo vuttā eva honti samānārammaṇabhāvato.
tika-s0519t:130_24: Na hi tehi vinā tassa uppatti atthi.
tika-s0519t:130_26: Atthādivasenapi hi sutte avuttānampi vuttānaṃ viya niddhāraṇaṃ sambhavatīti.
tika-s0519t:131_5: Nibbacanapubbāparasandhīsu vattabbameva natthīti āha “visesato byañjanadvāreneva atthapariyesanā”ti.
tika-s0519t:132_1: “Padaṭṭhāne”ti idaṃ sutte āgatadhammānaṃ kāraṇabhūtepi dhamme niddhāretvā sabhāgato,
tika-s0519t:132_2: visabhāgato ca āvaṭṭanaṃ kātabbanti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0519t:132_4: Tasmā padaṭṭhānaniddhāraṇāya vināpi āvaṭṭanaṃ yuttamevāti siddhaṃ hoti.
tika-s0519t:132_6: Etasmiṃ pakkhe “ārambhatha nikkamathāti vīriyassa padaṭṭhāna”nti ettha yvāyamārambhadhātuādiko attho vutto,
tika-s0519t:132_7: taṃ vīriyasaddassa pavattiṭṭhānaṃ vīriyasaddābhidheyyo atthoti evamattho veditabbo.
tika-s0519t:132_10: taṃ pana tassa paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ vā siyā,
tika-s0519t:132_14: “Paṭipakkhe”ti idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ sabhāgadhammavasenapi āvaṭṭanassa icchitattā.
tika-s0519t:133_3: aniyatānañca sattānaṃ dassanapahātabbā kilesā sādhāraṇā”tiāgatattā “dassanapahātabbādināmavasenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:133_5: So hi dhammānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānatāya idha “vatthū”ti adhippeto. Tenāha –
tika-s0519t:139_6: Ettha ca atthadvāreneva padapucchāsodhanampi karīyatīti puna “tassa atthassā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:139_18: kā ārambhasuddhī”ti evaṃ pucchākārinī pucchaṃ katvā pavattitā suddhāsuddhaparikkhāti yojanā.
tika-s0519t:140_8: puna taṃdivasātikkame “hiyyo”ti voharīyatīti anavaṭṭhitasabhāvā ete kālavisesā.
tika-s0519t:140_10: tato aññaṃ apekkhitvā pacchimā nāma hotī”tiādinā anavaṭṭhitasabhāvatā veditabbā.
tika-s0519t:140_13: “Taṇhā”ti vuccamānaṃ kāmataṇhādiapekkhāya sāmaññampi samānaṃ saccāpekkhāya viseso hotīti evamādiṃ sandhāyāha “esa nayo samudayādīsupī”ti.
tika-s0519t:141_5: “Atthato dassitā”ti idaṃ yasmiṃ sutte bhāvanāva kathitā,
tika-s0519t:143_7: balavavipassanāya ca dukkhādīsu pariññeyyatādīni maggānuguṇo gahaṇākāro anugāhaṇanayo.
tika-s0519t:143_8: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ nayoti āha “tassa panā”tiādi.
tika-s0519t:143_9: Tattha “nayavohāro”ti iminā nayādhiṭṭhānaṃ nayoti vuttanti dasseti.
tika-s0519t:144_4: Avisaṃvādanatoti ariyasabhāvādibhāvassa na visaṃvādanato ekantikattāti attho.
tika-s0519t:146_1: Atthavissajjanesūti “ime dhammā kusalā”tiādinā sutte katapañhavissajjanesu ceva aṭṭhakathāya kataatthasaṃvaṇṇanāsu ca.
tika-s0519t:146_4: Tassa tassa atthanayassa yojanatthaṃ manasā volokayateti yojanā.
tika-s0519t:149_5: Padassa vevacanatāya atthavasena pariyāyaṃ kharantaṃ sañcarantaṃ viya hoti,
tika-s0519t:149_6: na evaṃ vaṇṇo avevacanattāti āha pariyāyavasena akkharaṇato”ti.
tika-s0519t:149_7: Na hi vaṇṇassa pariyāyo vijjatī”ti idaṃ akārādivaṇṇavisesaṃ sandhāya vadati,
tika-s0519t:149_9: Tassa hi vaṇṇo akkharanti pariyāyo vutto evāti.
tika-s0519t:150_0: Akkharasaddassa atthaṃ vatvā tappasaṅgena vaṇṇasaddassapi vattuṃ “kenaṭṭhena vaṇṇo”tiādimāha.
tika-s0519t:150_3: na akkharenāti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “vaṇṇo eva hī”tiādi.
tika-s0519t:150_7: ayaṃ attho imassa saddassa vacanīyoti yathāgahitasaṅketānurūpaṃ saddatthānaṃ vācakavacanīyabhāvo.
tika-s0519t:150_8: Atha vā yvāyaṃ saddatthānaṃ aññamaññaṃ avinābhāvo,
tika-s0519t:150_10: Tadanurūpaṃ ekakkharaṃ nāmapadaṃ “mā evaṃ maññasī”tiādīsu mā- kārādi.
tika-s0519t:150_13: yato rāhulācariyo “visuddhakaruṇānaṃ manasādesanā vācāya akkharaṇato akkharasaññitā”ti āha.
tika-s0519t:151_10: mā evaṃ manasākatthā”tiādīsu kiriyāvisesassa jotako evaṃ- saddo.
tika-s0519t:152_13: Nanu ca padenapi attho byañjīyatīti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “padamattasavanepi hī”tiādi.
tika-s0519t:152_14: Ākāresu vākyavibhāgesu abhihitaṃ kathitaṃ nibbacanaṃ ākārābhihitaṃ nibbacanaṃ.
tika-s0519t:153_2: kilese vā mārento gacchatīti maggo”tiādinā nibbacanānaṃ vitthāro.
tika-s0519t:153_14: Kātabbanti “akkharaṃ padaṃ byañjanaṃ ākāro tatheva nirutti niddeso chaṭṭhavacana”nti gāthāyaṃ evaṃ kattabbaṃ,
tika-s0519t:153_15: saṃvaṇṇanāvasena vā ākārapadaṃ catutthaṃ kātabbanti attho.
tika-s0519t:154_4: padāvadhikāpi saṃvaṇṇanā icchitāti akkharehi pana kathanti āha “akkharehi suyyamānehī”tiādi.
tika-s0519t:154_6: “Akkharehi saṅkāsetī”tiādinā akkharakaraṇaṃ saṅkāsanabhūtaṃ ugghaṭanakiriyaṃ vadantena yathāvutto attho sādhitoti dassetuṃ “tathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:156_4: Sabbo hi pāḷiattho atthapadaatthanayehi anavasesato saṅgahito.
tika-s0519t:157_3: Mūlapadāni hi nayānaṃ samuṭṭhānamattattā padaṭṭhānānīti dassitoyaṃ nayo.
tika-s0519t:157_4: Tena vuttaṃ “ito vinimutto koci nettipadattho natthī”ti.
tika-s0519t:158_1: Hārā saṃvaṇṇetabbāti suttassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanāvasena hārā vitthāretabbā.
tika-s0519t:158_6: Ayaṃ ārambhoti “soḷasa hārā paṭhama”nti evaṃ pavatto ārambho.
tika-s0519t:159_0: Yadi desitakkameneva hāranayā sutte yojetabbā siyuṃ,
tika-s0519t:159_5: aneke atthā vuccamānā avassaṃ ekena kamena vuccantīti.
tika-s0519t:159_6: Evaṃ sante yena kenaci kamena sutte yojetabbā siyuṃ,
tika-s0519t:159_10: Itaro kāraṇagavesanaṃ akatvā attho evettha gavesitabboti adhippāyena “nāyamanuyogo na katthaci anukkame
tika-s0519t:159_11: nivisatī”ti vatvā “na pana mayaṃ devānaṃpiyassa manorathavighātāya cetemā”ti kamakāraṇaṃ vicārento “apicā”tiādinā
tika-s0519t:159_12: desanāhārassa tāva ādito desanāya kāraṇaṃ patiṭṭhapeti.
tika-s0519t:160_0: “Tathā hi vakkhatī”tiādinā yathāvuttaṃ atthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ karoti. Esa nayo itaresupi.
tika-s0519t:161_2: Tathā hīti lakkhaṇahāravibhaṅge yuttāyuttānaṃ kāraṇaparamparāya pariggahitasabhāvānaṃ avuttānampi ekalakkhaṇatāya gahaṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:162_0: Atthato niddhāritānanti atthuddhārapubbāparānusandhiādiatthato suttantarato uddhaṭānaṃ saṃvaṇṇiyamānasutte ānītānaṃ pāḷidhammānaṃ. Saddato,
tika-s0519t:162_1: pamāṇantarato ca laddhānaṃ idha vicāretabbattā āha “niravasesato”ti.
tika-s0519t:162_4: Tattha tattha taṃ abhiniropetīti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe,
tika-s0519t:162_11: Tathāti yathā anavasesatthāvabodhadīpakaṃ anavasesapariyādānaṃ kataṃ catubyūhapāḷiyaṃ,
tika-s0519t:162_12: evaṃ punappunaṃ gabbhamupetīti ettha asaddavatī atthā pavattivasena labbhamānā sammāpaṭipatti uddhaṭāti upasaṃhārattho tathā- saddo.
tika-s0519t:166_3: Suttassa atthaṃ tathattāvabodhāyāti suttassa padatthāvagamamukhena catusaccābhisamayāya.
tika-s0519t:167_1: Veneyyattayañhi paccayasamavāye tadupadesaphalaṃ adhigacchantaṃ atthaṃ payojeti nāmāti.
tika-s0519t:167_5: Yathā uddesādīnaṃ saṅkhepamajjhimavitthāravuttiyā tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ upakāratā,
tika-s0519t:168_7: Anusandhīyā anurūpaṃ nigametabbanti yāya anusandhiyā sutte upari desanā pavattā,
tika-s0519t:169_0: Pakatiādipadāvayavaṃ bhinditvā kathanaṃ bhedakathā yathā “dibbantīti devā”ti.
tika-s0519t:169_1: Padassa atthakathanaṃ tatvakathā yathā “buddhoti yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako”ti.
tika-s0519t:170_0: Attano phalaṃ dhāretīti dhammoti hetuno dhammabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-s0519t:170_1: Ñāpakahetūpi ñāṇakaraṇaṭṭhena kārake pakkhipitvā āha “kārako sampāpakoti duvidho”ti.
tika-s0519t:170_9: cattāro mahābhūtā paccayo rūpakkhandhassa paññāpanāyā”tiādinā āgato paccayahetu nāma.
tika-s0519t:170_10: Kusalākusalaṃ kammaṃ attano vipākaṃ pati uttamahetu nāma.
tika-s0519t:171_0: Nibbānassa anibbattaniyepi samudayappahānasamudayanirodhānaṃ adhigamādhigantabbabhāvato nibbānaṃ pati
tika-s0519t:171_1: maggassa hetubhāvo viya maggaṃ pati nibbānassa phalabhāvo upacārasiddhoti āha “phalapariyāyo labbhatī”ti.
tika-s0519t:174_6: taṃsampayogato cetasikānampi gahitāva hoti aññattha nesaṃ cittena sampayogadīpanato.
tika-s0519t:174_8: Saññāsahitatāvacanena hi nesaṃ vedanācetanādivantatāpi sampayogato dīpitā hoti.
tika-s0519t:175_2: Hetusampayuttā hi dhammā “sahetukā”ti vuttāti tabbidhurā dhammā vippayogato “ahetukā”ti vuttāti viññāyati.
tika-s0519t:176_2: saddhānusārī”ti ca vutte taṃ santatiyaṃ saṃyojanattayappahānaṃ viññāyati,
tika-s0519t:176_3: tathā “sati vā upādisese anāgāmitā”ti vutte pañcorambhāgiyasaṃyojanappahānaṃ,
tika-s0519t:177_2: Adhikārato hi kusalākusalabhāvena na kathitāti ñāyati.
tika-s0519t:177_4: Bāhirā hi dhammā idha “upadhī”ti adhippetāti viññāyati.
tika-s0519t:178_3: Sītādiggahaṇena hi liṅgena bhūtupādāyappakārasseva dhammassa rūpabhāvo,
tika-s0519t:180_5: Ettha hi satipi sabbasaddassa anavasesasattavācakatte ādittatā sāpekkhasseva atthassa vācakattā padesavācī sabbasaddo,
tika-s0519t:180_8: Tathā “mātaraṃ pitaraṃ hantvā”ti sabbena sabbaṃ hi sapaṭikkhepato,
tika-s0519t:180_10: idha ca tadanuññāya katāya mātupituṭṭhāniyā tādisā keci pāpadhammā veneyyavasena gahitā viññāyati.
tika-s0519t:180_15: Pituṭṭhāniyo māno taṃ nissāya attasampaggaṇhato “ahaṃ asukassa ruñño,
tika-s0519t:181_3: Hetuphalādīni upadhāretvā yojetabbāni tesaṃ vasenāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0519t:181_4: Idāni hetuphalādayo ye yasmiṃ hāre savisesaṃ icchitabbā,
tika-s0519t:186_1: “Dhammaṃ vo”tiādi vacanassa sambandhaṃ dassetuṃ “kattha panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:186_3: tañca pariyattidhammasaṅgāhake suttapade saṃvaṇṇetabbabhāvena gahite gahitameva hoti.
tika-s0519t:187_2: idhāpi ca āgate “assādaṃ ādīnava”ntiādinā udāharaṇavasena vibhajituṃ “tattha katamo assādo”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0519t:187_3: Tattha tatthāti tassaṃ “assādādīnavatā”ti gāthāyaṃ vutto katamo assādo.
tika-s0519t:187_4: Atha vā “assādaṃ ādīnava”ntiādinā yo idha assādādīnaṃ uddeso,
tika-s0519t:187_9: vaṭṭadukkhalakkhaṇassa cāti duvidhassāpi ādīnavassa nidassanatthaṃ “ariyamaggo nibbāna”nti duvidhassāpi
tika-s0519t:187_10: nissaraṇassa nidassananidassanatthañca dve dve gāthā udāhaṭā.
tika-s0519t:188_0: Dhammo have rakkhati dhammacārinti ettha dhammacārino maggaphalanibbānehi sātisayārakkhā sambhavati,
tika-s0519t:188_1: sampattibhavassāpi vipariṇāmasaṅkhāradukkhatāhi duggatibhāvo icchitovāti adhippāyenāha “nissaraṇaṃ anāmasitvā”ti.
tika-s0519t:188_2: Tathā hi vakkhati “nibbānaṃ vā upanidhāya sabbā upapattiyo duggatī”ti.
tika-s0519t:189_13: Evaṃ maccutaro siyāti evaṃ paṭipattiyā maccutaro bhaveyyāti attho.
tika-s0519t:189_14: Parikappetvā vidhiyamānassa maccutaraṇassa pubbabhāgapaṭipadā desanāya paccakkhato sijjhamānaṃ sātisayaṃ phalanti āha “tassa yaṃ…pe…
tika-s0519t:190_2: Tattha “puggalavibhāgenā”ti iminā ugghaṭitaññuādipuggalapayojito assādādīsu bhagavato desanāvisesoti dasseti.
tika-s0519t:194_2: Ugghaṭite jānātīti ugghaṭitaññūti mūlavibhujādipakkhepena saddasiddhi veditabbā.
tika-s0519t:194_3: Vipañcitanti “visamaṃ candimasūriyā parivattantī”tiādīsu viya bhāvanapuṃsakaniddesoti āha “mandaṃ saṇika”nti.
tika-s0519t:195_0: Cattāroti assādo ca ādīnavo ca assādo ādīnavo ca assādo nissaraṇañcāti ete cattāro.
tika-s0519t:195_3: Yadi hi ugghaṭitaññuṃ sandhāya ayaṃ nayo vuccati,
tika-s0519t:195_7: ādīnavo ca nissaraṇañca assādo ca ādīnavo nissaraṇañca vattabbo siyā?
tika-s0519t:195_10: Desananti sāmaññato gahitaṃ “suttekadesaṃ gāthaṃ vā”ti viseseti.
tika-s0519t:196_3: Lābhādīnaṃ puññaphalattā tadanurodhaṃ vā sandhāya “ayaṃ assādo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:198_0: Tattha “kāmā hi citrā madhurā manoramā”ti ayaṃ assādo,
tika-s0519t:199_0: Phalādīnaṃ ekakavasena ca tikavasena ca pāḷiyaṃ udāhaṭattā vuttaṃ “dukavasenapī”ti.
tika-s0519t:200_2: tāsu ekekā dandhakhippābhiññatāya dve dve hontīti āha “paṭipadābhiññākato vibhāgo paṭipadākato hotī”ti.
tika-s0519t:200_6: Tadaññā heṭṭhimapaññato adhikā paññāti katvā “abhiññā”ti vuccati.
tika-s0519t:201_0: Kileseti nīvaraṇappakāre, taṃsahagatakilese ca. Aṅgapātubhāvanti vitakkādijhānaṅgapaṭilābhaṃ.
tika-s0519t:202_1: Rūpārūpaṃ pariggaṇhantoti rūpārūpadhamme lakkhaṇādīhi paricchinditvā gaṇhanto.
tika-s0519t:202_2: Pariggahitarūpārūpassa maggapātubhāvadandhatā ca nāmarūpavavatthānādīnaṃ kicchasiddhiyā siyāti na rūpārūpapariggahakicchatāya
tika-s0519t:202_4: nāmarūpavavatthāpanādīnaṃ paccanīkakilesamandatāya sukhasiddhiyampi tathāsiddhavipassanāsahagatānaṃ indriyānaṃ mandatāya maggapātubhāvato.
tika-s0519t:202_9: na añño koci sattādiko”ti vavatthāpanaṃ karonto.
tika-s0519t:202_15: na tato uddhaṃ sukhā paṭipadā hoti,
tika-s0519t:202_16: tasmā tikkhattuṃ vikkhambhanavārato paṭṭhāya dukkhā paṭipadā veditabbā.
tika-s0519t:202_17: Apica kalāpasammasanāvasāne udayabbayānupassanāya uppannassa vipassanupakkilesassa tikkhattuṃ vikkhambhanena kicchatāvāro dukkhā paṭipadā veditabbā.
tika-s0519t:202_18: Ettha dandhattā paṭipadāya etassa akicchattepi purimānaṃ kicchatte dukkhāpaṭipadatā vuttanayāva.
tika-s0519t:203_0: Yathā nāmarūpapariggahakicchatāya maggapātubhāvadandhatāya dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā vuttā,
tika-s0519t:206_2: Samānādhikaraṇavasena ca cetovimuttisaddānaṃ samāsaṃ katvā bhinnādhikaraṇavasena vattuṃ “atha vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:206_3: Puna “cetaso vā”tiādinā aññapadatthavasena cetovimuttipadānaṃ samāsaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0519t:207_2: gati cettha ñāṇagati adhippetāti āha “hātabbāti gametabbā”ti.
tika-s0519t:209_3: Pariyattidhammassa upadhāraṇanti etthāpi “adhikārato sāmatthiyato vā”ti ānetvā yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:210_2: cintāya hetubhūtāya nibbattā cintāmayī”ti evamādivuttanayānusārena sakkā yojetunti āha “sesaṃ vuttanayamevā”ti.
tika-s0519t:211_0: Sutacintāmayañāṇesūti sutamayañāṇe ca cintāmayañāṇe ca sutacintāmayañāṇesu ca sutacintāmayañāṇesūti ekadesasarūpekaseso veditabbo.
tika-s0519t:211_1: Cintāmayañāṇeyeva hi patiṭṭhitā mahābodhisattā carimabhave vipassanaṃ ārabhanti,
tika-s0519t:212_2: “Paccattasamuṭṭhitena ca yonisomanasikārenā”ti idaṃ āvuttinayena dutiyaṃ āvaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:212_5: Etasmiṃ pakkhe pubbe vuttaekasesanayopi paṭikkhitto daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0519t:212_7: sandhāya “imā dve paññā atthī”ti vuttanti dasseti.
tika-s0519t:216_3: tadatthassa ca dhammacakkappavattena suttena saṅgahitattā vuttaṃ “sabbassāpi…pe…
tika-s0519t:217_7: Nānāvākyavisayatāpi siddhā hoti padādīhipi saṅkāsanassa siddhattā.
tika-s0519t:217_8: Ekavākyavisayatāya hi atthapadānaṃ saṅkāsanādayo yathākkamaṃ akkharādivisayā evāti niyamo siyā.
tika-s0519t:219_1: Upatiṭṭhati etthāti upaṭṭhitanti upaṭṭhitasaddassa adhikaraṇatthataṃ dassetuṃ “upatiṭṭhanaṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ yathā “padakkanta”nti.
tika-s0519t:219_5: jarāmaraṇassā”tiādinā jarāmaraṇato paṭṭhāya paṭiccasamuppādamukhena vipassanaṃ abhinivisitvā mahāgahanaṃ
tika-s0519t:219_6: chindituṃ nisānasilāyaṃ pharasuṃ nisento viya kilesagahanaṃ chindituṃ lokanātho ñāṇapharasuṃ tejento
tika-s0519t:219_7: buddhabhāvāya hetusampattiyā paripākagatattā sabbaññutaññāṇādhigamāya vipassanāgabbhaṃ gaṇhāpento antarantarā
tika-s0519t:219_8: nānāsamāpattiyo samāpajjitvā anupadadhammavipassanāvasena anekākāravokārasaṅkhāre sammasanto chattiṃsakoṭisatasahassamukhena
tika-s0519t:219_12: taṃ devasikaṃ vaḷañjanakasamāpattīnaṃ purecarānucarañāṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:219_15: Etaṃ brahmacariyanti sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ adhippetanti taṃ dassento “brahmuno”tiādimāha.
tika-s0519t:220_1: Niyuttoti ettha hetuattho antonītoti dassento “niddhāretvā yojito”ti āha.
tika-s0519t:223_2: Tattha kariyamāno ca yathāsabhāvaniruttiyā eva kato sukato hotīti dassento “idaṃ nāmapadaṃ …pe…
tika-s0519t:223_4: Vattabbaatthasaṃvaṇṇanāti taṃtaṃpadavacanīyassa atthassa bhedaṃ vatvā pariyāyehi vivaritvā kathanaṃ.
tika-s0519t:224_2: Ekasseva padassa sambhavantānaṃ anekesaṃ atthānaṃ uddhāro atthuddhāro.
tika-s0519t:224_3: Ekasseva pana atthassa sambhavantānaṃ anekesaṃ padānaṃ uddhāro paduddhāro.
tika-s0519t:224_4: Sabbe hi saṃvaṇṇiyamāne sutte labbhamāne sabbe padatthe.
tika-s0519t:224_5: Nava suttanteti suttageyyādivasena navappakāre suttasmiṃ ānetvā vicinatīti yojanā.
tika-s0519t:224_6: Atha vā “sabbe nava suttante”ti iminā pavicayalakkhaṇena hārena suttageyyādīni sabbānipi navappakārāni suttāni vicinatīti attho.
tika-s0519t:225_2: Idaṃ nāmaṃ katanti idaṃ “pārāyana”nti nāmaṃ kataṃ.
tika-s0519t:225_5: Buddhiyaṃ viparivattamānanti imassa vicayahāravibhaṅgassa desanākāle āyasmā mahākaccāno attano buddhiyaṃ vattamānaṃ katvā evamāhāti yojanā.
tika-s0519t:226_5: Samayantaraparicayena nivāraṇadhammaṃ pati saṃsayapakkhando pucchatīti adhippāyenāha “vimaticchedana”nti.
tika-s0519t:226_6: Pakatiyā pana nivāraṇadhammaṃ ajānanto ñātukāmatāya pucchatīti adiṭṭhajotanāya pucchāpi siyā.
tika-s0519t:228_1: kiṃ panettha ariyānampi indriyalokena saṅgaho hotīti āha “pariyāpannadhammavasenā”tiādi.
