tika-s0519t:305_1: sukhavedanassādavasena paralokanirapekkho “natthi dinna”ntiādi parāmāsaṃ uppādetīti diṭṭhupādānassa vedanā,
tika-s0519t:305_2: citte niccaggahaṇavasena sassatassa “attano sīlādivasena parisuddhaparāmasanaṃ hotī”ti sīlabbatupādānassa cittaṃ,
tika-s0519t:305_3: nāmarūpaparicchedena bhūtaṃ bhūtato apassantassa “attābhiniveso hotī”ti attavādupādānassa dhammā vatthu,
tika-s0519t:305_4: tasmā “catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu bhāviyamānesu upādānehi anupādāno bhavatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:306_0: Yasmā pana vuttanayeneva kāyo kāmayogassa vatthu,
tika-s0519t:306_1: bhavesu sukhaggahaṇavasena bhavassādo hotīti bhavayogassa vedanā,
tika-s0519t:306_4: dhammānaṃ dhammamattatāya ca duppaṭivijjhattā sammoho hotīti avijjāyogassa dhammā, vatthu,
tika-s0519t:306_5: tasmā catusatipaṭṭhānabhāvanāya tesu tesaṃ pahānasiddhito yogehi visaṃyuttatā vuttā.
tika-s0519t:306_7: oghehi nittiṇṇatā ca saṃvaṇṇitā hoti kāmarāgādīnaṃ eva kāmayogakāmāsavakāmoghādibhāvato.
tika-s0519t:307_1: “dukkhāya vedanāya paṭighānusayo anusetī”ti dukkhadukkhavipariṇāmadukkhasaṅkhāradukkhabhūtā vedanā visesena byāpādakāyaganthassa vatthu,
tika-s0519t:307_2: citte niccābhinivesavasena sassatassa “attano sīlena suddhī”tiādiparāmasanaṃ hotīti sīlabbataparāmāsassa cittaṃ vatthu,
tika-s0519t:307_3: sappaccayanāmarūpadassanābhāvato bhavavibhavadiṭṭhisaṅkhāto idaṃsaccābhiniveso hotīti tassa dhammā vatthūti catusatipaṭṭhānāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:308_2: “cittaṃ niccaggahaṇavasena attābhinivesaṃ attānaṃ seyyādito dahatī”ti cittaṃ mānasallassa,
tika-s0519t:308_3: vuttanayeneva dhammā mohasallassa vatthūti catusatipaṭṭhānāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:309_0: Yasmā pana kāyānupassanādīhi kāyavedanācittadhammesu pariññātesu rūpavedanāsaññāsaṅkhārakkhandhā pariññātā honti,
tika-s0519t:309_1: citte hi pariññāte saññāpi pariññātāva hoti,
tika-s0519t:310_0: Tathā visesato kāye sāpekkhā chandāgatiṃ gacchatīti kāyo chandāgatiyā vatthu,
tika-s0519t:310_1: vuttanayeneva vedanā byāpādassa nimittanti sā dosāgatiyā vatthu,
tika-s0519t:310_2: santatighanaggahaṇavasena sarāgādicitte sammoho hotīti mohāgatiyā cittaṃ,
tika-s0519t:310_3: dhammasabhāvānavabodhena bhayaṃ hotīti bhayāgatiyā dhammā vatthūti catusatipaṭṭhānabhāvanāya agatigamanappahānaṃ
tika-s0519t:310_4: hotīti āha “agatigamanehi ca na agatiṃ gacchatī”ti.
tika-s0519t:311_0: “Akusalassa somanassassa vasenā”ti idaṃ “ayampi attho sambhavatī”ti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:311_1: “Sukhāya vedanāya rāgānusayo anusetī”ti pana vacanato sukhavedanāggahaṇena tatthānusayanena samudayasaccaṃ desitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:311_2: Desitaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccanti dukkhadukkhaggahaṇena sātisayaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ pakāsitaṃ hotīti pāḷiyaṃ “dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ desita”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:314_2: Hāresu imassa catubyūhahārassa visesato suttassa byañjanavicayabhāvatoti yojanā.
tika-s0519t:315_0: Yathārahanti saṃvaṇṇiyamāne sutte yaṃ yaṃ arahati nibbacanaṃ vattuṃ,
tika-s0519t:315_2: Pubbabhāgapaṭipadā sampādetvā pacchā saccābhisamayaṃ pāpuṇātīti āha “sammuti…pe… hotī”ti,
tika-s0519t:315_3: taṃtaṃpaññattiggahaṇamukhena paramatthaggahaṇaṃ hotīti evaṃ vā iminā sambandho.
tika-s0519t:316_1: Otaraṇahāre panassa dvārappavattaphassādidhamme sandhāya vuttabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “ubhayamantarenāti phassasamuditesu dhammesū”ti attho vutto.
tika-s0519t:316_11: na huraṃ lokaṃ nissāya jhāyati jhāyī,
tika-s0519t:317_1: sambhavesī”ti ca imesaṃ suttapadānaṃ atthaṃ micchā gahetvā atthi eva antarābhavoti vadanti,
tika-s0519t:317_2: tepi yasmā avihādīsu tattha tattha āyuvemajjhaṃ anatikkamitvā antarā aggamaggādhigamena anavasesakilesaparinibbānena
tika-s0519t:317_12: Catūsu vā yonīsu aṇḍajajalābujasattā yāva aṇḍakosaṃ,
tika-s0519t:317_16: vatthikosato ca bahi nikkhantā bhūtā nāma.
tika-s0519t:317_24: Sati hi ujuke pāḷianugate atthe kiṃ aniddhāritasāmatthiyena antarābhavena attabhāvaparikappitena payojananti.
tika-s0519t:318_0: Yaṃ pana ye “santānavasena pavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ avicchedena desantaresu pātubhāvo diṭṭho.
tika-s0519t:318_2: evaṃ saviññāṇakasantānepi avicchedena desantaresu pātubhāvena bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:318_5: Tehi iddhimato cetovasippattassa cittānugatikaṃ kāyaṃ adhiṭṭhahantassa khaṇena brahmalokato idhūpasaṅkamane,
tika-s0519t:318_7: Yadi sabbattheva vicchinnadese dhammānaṃ pavatti na icchitā,
tika-s0519t:318_14: Tathā hi mukhaghosādīhi aññasmiṃ dese ādāsapabbatappadesādike paṭibimbapaṭighosādikaṃ paccayuppannaṃ nibbattamānaṃ dissati,
tika-s0519t:318_15: tasmā na sabbaṃ sabbattha upanetabbanti ayamettha saṅkhepo.
tika-s0519t:318_16: Vitthārato pana paṭibimbassa udāharaṇabhāvasādhanādiko antarābhavavicāro kathāvatthuppakaraṇassaṭīkāyaṃ gahetabbo.
tika-s0519t:319_10: Tassa khīṇāsavassa taṃ nibbānārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ na jānanti na ñāyanti “jhāyamānā”ti vuttattā.
tika-s0519t:322_2: akusalānaṃ vā pajahane kusalānaṃ sampādane paṭṭhapanasabhāvattā ārambhadhātu.
tika-s0519t:322_6: Anādimatisaṃsāre cirakālaṃ laddhapatiṭṭhāpi acirakālaṃ bhāvitehi kusalehi dhammehi samucchindanīyattā abalā kilesāti vuttaṃ “abalaṃ dubbala”nti.
tika-s0519t:323_1: Samādhissa padaṭṭhānanti ettha samādhissa kāraṇaṃ samatānuyoge niyojanatoti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:323_4: Tathā ceva saṃvaṇṇitanti desanāya padaṭṭhānabhāveneva atthasaṃvaṇṇanā katāti attho.
tika-s0519t:324_4: So pariyesanāya sati hotīti pariyesanāggahaṇena gahito.
tika-s0519t:324_10: ettakaṃ nidahissāmī”ti evaṃ pavatto vitakko vinicchayo.
tika-s0519t:324_15: Tenevassa porāṇā evaṃ vacanatthaṃ vadanti “mayhevidamacchariyaṃ hotu,
tika-s0519t:324_16: mā aññesaṃ acchariyaṃ hotūti pavattattā macchariyanti vuccatī”ti.
tika-s0519t:324_19: Ajjhosānaṃ “mama ida”nti taṇhāvasena balavasanniṭṭhānanti āha “chandarāgaajjhosānā taṇhā evā”ti.
tika-s0519t:324_21: Pāpāni karonto paribhoganimittaṃ ratto giddho gadhito mucchito hutvā migova paribhuñjananimittaṃ pamādaṃ
tika-s0519t:324_23: Pamādo tividho taṇhāya vasena kathitoti dassento “tividho taṇhāyāti vutta”nti āha.
tika-s0519t:325_0: Avisesena vuttanti “katamena upādānena saupādānā”ti vibhāgena pucchitvāpi “avijjāya ca taṇhāya cā”ti avinibbhujitvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:325_1: Taṇhañca avijjañca caturupādānaṃ vasenāti kāmupādānādīnaṃ catunnaṃ upādānānaṃ vasena vibhajitvā khandhānaṃ
tika-s0519t:325_3: upādānānaṃ samudayabhāvena samudayasaccabhāvena saha pahātabbabhāvaṃ dassetīti yojanā.
tika-s0519t:326_4: Pamādo hi pamajjantassa puggalassa bhogānaṃ pariyesanāya,
tika-s0519t:326_10: Vodānapakkhavisabhāgadhammavasenāti vodānapakkho ca so pamādassa visabhāgadhammo cāti vodāna…pe… dhammo, samatho,
tika-s0519t:329_0: Puna apariyodāpaniyaṃ sikhāppattapariyodāpanaṃ idhādhippetanti āha “taṃ pana arahattena hotī”ti.
tika-s0519t:330_1: Aññathā pisuṇāvācāya dosasamuṭṭhānatā musāvādassa viya mohasamuṭṭhānabhāvā vattabbā siyā.
tika-s0519t:333_0: Upari yāpentīti manussalokato upariṭṭhimaṃ devalokaṃ gamenti.
tika-s0519t:334_1: Yathāvuttassa dhammassāti sīlassa ca maggassa ca.
tika-s0519t:334_6: tadaggena maggo rakkhaṇakiriyāya karaṇaṃ vuttaṃ “yena rakkhatī”ti.
tika-s0519t:334_7: Visabhāgadhammavasena purimāni sabhāgadhammāvaṭṭanavasena pacchimāni saccāni niddhāritānīti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:337_2: Tattha labbhamānoti tesu yathāvuttesu dhammesu labbhamāno.
tika-s0519t:337_7: Yesaṃ suttānanti mūlapadaṭṭhānabhūtānaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyādīnaṃ catunnaṃ suttānaṃ vasena.
tika-s0519t:337_8: Asaṅkaravavatthānena hi etesu suttesu sātisayaṃ dhammā vibhattā nāma honti.
tika-s0519t:337_10: Yadi evaṃ kasmā vāsanābhāgiyanibbedhabhāgiyasuttāni evettha gahitānīti?
tika-s0519t:337_15: te asekkhabhāgiyāti dvayaggahaṇeneva itarampi dvayaṃ gahitameva hoti.
tika-s0519t:338_1: tato ca tena tannissitena ca brahmacārī bhavatīti siddhaṃ hoti. Eva-
tika-s0519t:338_3: Siyā tassa paṭikkhepoti tassa aṭṭhasamāpattibrahmacariyassa siyā paṭikkhepo.
tika-s0519t:339_0: Tadaṅgādippahānadvayaṃ padaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ idha gaṇanūpagaṃ na hotīti “samucchedapaṭippassaddhippahānānaṃ vasenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:339_2: “Teneva brahmacariyenāti paṭhantī”ti idaṃ “saṃvarasīle ṭhito”ti ettha vuttaṃ pāḷivikappaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0519t:340_3: Tadupasaṅgā hi pacchimo eva pāṭho yuttataro.
tika-s0519t:341_3: Tassa parāpekkhatāya “sabbatobhāgena ekādasasu ṭhānesu pakkhipitvā”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ yojitaṃ.
tika-s0519t:341_4: Tattha padādike vicayahārapadatthe sandhāya “ekādasasu ṭhānesū”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:342_3: Phalaṃ aggaphalena ca anupādisesāya ca nibbānadhātuyā veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:342_6: virāgaggahaṇena asekkhaggahaṇeneva ca asekkhabhāgiyānaṃ vakkhamānattā vuttaṃ “vakkhamānānaṃ…pe…
tika-s0519t:343_4: Dve dhammā sādhāraṇāti dve ime dhammā yehi sabhāgadhammā sādhāraṇā nāma honti.
tika-s0519t:343_9: Saddena ca sāmaññarūpeneva tathārūpassa atthassa gahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0519t:343_11: tasmā saddavacanīyā atthā sādhāraṇarūpanāmāyattagahaṇīyatāya nāmasādhāraṇā vuttā.
tika-s0519t:343_14: tesaṃ sabbesaṃ te dhammā sādhāraṇāti pavattiṭṭhānasaṅkhātānaṃ vatthūnaṃ sādhāraṇā.
tika-s0519t:343_15: Yasmā panidaṃ dvayaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ sādhāraṇabhāve pakatibhūtaṃ sabhāvabhūtaṃ,
tika-s0519t:343_20: evaṃ aniyatāpīti ubhaye hi te samānavatthukā.
tika-s0519t:343_22: Sakkāyadiṭṭhivicikicchāsīlabbataparāmāsā hi bhinnasabhāvāpete dhammā dassanena pahātabbataṃ nātivattantīti te nāmasāmaññataṃ pattā,
tika-s0519t:343_23: rūparāgādayo ca bhāvanāya pahātabbatanti āha “pahānekaṭṭhā nāmasādhāraṇā”ti.
tika-s0519t:343_24: Yathā pana “vatthūnaṃ sādhāraṇā vatthusādhāraṇā”ti ayamattho labbhati,
tika-s0519t:343_25: evaṃ “vatthunā sādhāraṇā vatthusādhāraṇā”ti ayampi attho labbhatīti dassento “sahajekaṭṭhā vatthusādhāraṇā”ti āha.
tika-s0519t:343_26: Te hi aññamaññaṃ phusanādisabhāvato bhinnāpi yasmiṃ pavattanti,
tika-s0519t:343_28: Ettha ca labbhamānampi kusalādināmasādhāraṇaṃ anāmasitvā vatthusādhāraṇā tāva yojitāti veditabbā.
tika-s0519t:344_0: Kathaṃ te odhiso gahitāti kenākārena te “sādhāraṇā”ti vuttadhammā bhāgaso gahitā.
tika-s0519t:344_4: evaṃ sante kathaṃ tesaṃ micchattaniyatāniyatādivasena vibhāgena pavattiṭṭhānatā vuccati,
tika-s0519t:344_9: aniyatānanti imesaṃ ubhayesaṃyeva te dhammā sādhāraṇā. Tenāha –
tika-s0519t:344_12: tenetaṃ dasseti “keci dhammā kesañcideva dhammānaṃ sādhāraṇā honti,
tika-s0519t:345_4: asādhāraṇā”ti ca ayaṃ vohāro sāmaññā eva na bhaveyya.
tika-s0519t:346_3: Koci dhammo kañci dhammaṃ upādāya sādhāraṇopi samāno tadaññaṃ upādāya asādhāraṇopi hotīti āha “sādhāraṇāvidhuratāyā”ti.
tika-s0519t:346_6: tādisānaṃ eva anekesaṃ ariyānaṃ vasena sādhāraṇāti.
tika-s0519t:346_12: Aggaphalaṭṭhato paṭṭhāya paṭilomato gaṇiyamāno paṭhamamaggaṭṭho aṭṭhamako,
tika-s0519t:346_14: pahīyamānakilesatāya ca sabbepi maggaṭṭhā aṭṭhamakā viyāti aṭṭhamakā,
tika-s0519t:346_15: “ekacittakkhaṇato uddhaṃ na tiṭṭhatīti aṭṭhamako”ti apare niruttinayena.
tika-s0519t:347_3: Yathā hi ñāṇabalena dandhābhiññatā na hoti,
tika-s0519t:347_5: Sā hi sukhāpaṭipadā khippābhiññā taṃsamaṅgino ñāṇuttarattā vipassanāya padaṭṭhānanti vuttā.
tika-s0519t:349_1: tathārūpāssa dhammā bahussutā hontī”tiādi suttapadasaṅgaho attho pariggahito,
tika-s0519t:349_2: tathā yonisomanasikāraggahaṇena “so ‘anicca’nti yoniso manasi karotī”tiādinā vutto upāyamanasikāro pariggahito.
tika-s0519t:349_3: Sammādiṭṭhiggahaṇena “sammādiṭṭhiṃ bhāveti vivekanissita”ntiādinā vuttā sammādiṭṭhi pariggahitāti dassento āha “atha kho…pe…
tika-s0519t:350_0: Yassa ca pubbe attho na saṃvaṇṇito,
tika-s0519t:350_6: Dhammo svākkhāto ādito paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā sabbasampattipāripūrihetūti dassento “dhammasvākkhātatā…pe…
tika-s0519t:353_2: nijjiṇṇā bhavatīti ettha yathā maggasammādiṭṭhivasenattho vutto,
tika-s0519t:356_1: sukho tesaṃ adhammo”ti ca imesu vāresu.
tika-s0519t:356_2: Vuttanayenāti yadi attaparitāpanaṃ attano dukkhāpanaṃ dhammo,
tika-s0519t:356_5: anavajjapaccayaparibhogasukhassa ca tesaṃ adhammabhāvo āpajjatīti evaṃ vattabbā.
tika-s0519t:356_7: Ettha yaṃ yaṃ vā pana dhammanti yaṃ vā taṃ vā dhammaṃ,
tika-s0519t:356_8: kusalaṃ vā akusalaṃ vā iṭṭhaṃ vā aniṭṭhaṃ vāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0519t:356_9: Rocayati vā upagacchati vāti cittena rocati,
tika-s0519t:356_11: Tassa tassa dhammassa yo paṭipakkhoti tassa tassa rucitassa,
tika-s0519t:356_12: upagatassa vā dhammassa yo paṭipakkho nāma.
tika-s0519t:356_13: Svassa aniṭṭhato ajjhāpanno bhavatīti yo dhammo assa rucitassa,
tika-s0519t:356_14: upagatassa vā dhammassa aniṭṭhato paccanīkato abbhupagato hoti,
tika-s0519t:356_15: tena paṭipakkhena desanāya parivattanaṃ parivattano hāroti attho.
tika-s0519t:359_4: paṭhamaṃ vuttena pariyāyena appaṭivijjhanto aparena pariyāyena paṭivijjheyyāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0519t:359_11: nanu tena vutte daḷhīkaraṇaṃ hotīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “tenevā”tiādi.
tika-s0519t:359_15: Adhigataanvatthatāya punarutti parivajjanatthaṃ visesanabhāvena tāhi tāhi saññāhipi ayampi saddo imassatthassa vācako,
tika-s0519t:359_17: Desetabbassa tassa tassa atthassa attano citte upanibandhanaṃ ṭhapanaṃ.
tika-s0519t:360_0: Evaṃ bhagavato pariyāyadesanāyaṃ anekāni payojanāni vatvā idāni attano sammāsambuddhatāya evaṃ tathāgatā
tika-s0519t:360_1: buddhalīlāya anekehi pariyāyehi dhammaṃ desentīti dassento “kiṃ bahunā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0519t:361_0: Pāḷiyaṃ “pihā nāma yā vattamānassa atthassa patthanā”ti paccuppannavisayataṃ dassetvā puna anāgatavisayataṃ
tika-s0519t:361_1: dassetuṃ “seyyataraṃ vā”tiādi vuttanti “anāgatapaccuppannatthavisayā taṇhā pihā”ti āha.
tika-s0519t:362_0: Atthanipphattipaṭipālanāti imasmiṃ vā pade pihāya evatthavasena anāgatapaccuppannatthavisayabhāvadīpanato.
tika-s0519t:363_1: Catuvīsati padānīti ettha gehasitadomanassūpavicārādīnaṃ catunnaṃ chakkānaṃ vasena catuvīsa koṭṭhāsā.
tika-s0519t:364_2: sā eva patthanākārena pavattiyā āsādipariyāyena vuttā taṇhā rūpādidhammesu nandanaṭṭhena dhammanandī.
tika-s0519t:365_0: Imināpīti na kevalaṃ “paññā pajānanā”tiādiāveṇikapariyāyeneva vevacanaṃ vattabbaṃ,
tika-s0519t:365_1: atha kho iminā ādhipateyyādisādhāraṇapariyāyenapi vevacanaṃ vattabbanti attho.
tika-s0519t:365_3: Na hi desanatthasādhanaṃ “itipi so bhagavā”tiādipāḷinayadassananti dasseti.
tika-s0519t:365_4: Balanipphattigatotiādīsu dasasu tathāgatabalesu nipphattiṃ pāripūriṃ gato.
tika-s0519t:365_5: Sambodhipahānantarāyadesanā visesacodanāsu visāradabhāvasaṅkhātāni cattāri ñāṇāni patto adhigatoti vesārajjappatto.
tika-s0519t:366_2: akuppadhammatāya guṇehi vā asaṅkhepaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ gato upagatoti asaṅkhepagato.
tika-s0519t:367_2: santena sukhena rameti cāti vā pāraṃ.
tika-s0519t:368_1: tenassa niccataṃva vibhāveti kenaci devatopasaggādinā anupasajjanīyattā anupasaṭṭhattā.
tika-s0519t:370_0: Yathā akkhaṇavedhī puggalo sippanipphattiyā rattandhakāratimisāya acirakkhaṇālokena atisukhumampi dūragataṃ lakkhaṃ vijjhati,
tika-s0519t:370_1: evaṃ ariyasāvako sīlasampattiyā atisukhumaṃ nibbānaṃ catusaccadhammaṃ ekapaṭivedheneva paṭivijjhatīti āha “sippañca sīlaṃ akkhaṇavedhitāyā”ti.
tika-s0519t:373_6: tāya karaṇabhūtāya dhammadesanāya anaññattepi kathādesanānaṃ upacārasiddhena bhedenevaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0519t:373_10: Idañhi atthassa desanāya abhedopacāraṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:373_14: Tathā tathāti yathā yathā saccāni desetabbāni,
tika-s0519t:374_0: Tatthāti nikkhepadesanāyanti attho. Maggapakkhiyāti dukkhasaccato bahikatāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0519t:375_1: Yathāvuttā desanāti caturāhārapaṭibaddharāgādimukhena vaṭṭadīpanī vuttappakārā desanā.
tika-s0519t:376_4: samāhitoti padadvayena samādhānavisiṭṭhaṃ ajjhattaratatābhāvanaṃ dīpeti gocarajjhattatādīpanato.
tika-s0519t:376_6: Ajjhattaratatāvisiṭṭhañca samādhānaṃ sātisayaṃ cittaṭṭhitiṃ dīpetīti imamatthaṃ dasseti “samādhānavisiṭṭhassā”tiādinā.
tika-s0519t:377_1: Tathā dassananti atathābhūtassāpi bhabbarūpassa viya attano vidaṃsanaṃ.
tika-s0519t:378_6: kilesasamucchedakassa ariyamaggassa ārammaṇabhāvato ca attheva asaṅkhatā dhātu,
tika-s0519t:378_7: tathā vuccamānenāpi kāraṇena attheva asaṅkhatā dhātūti dasseti.
tika-s0519t:378_10: “Yato kho bho ayaṃ attā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito samaṅgībhūto paricāreti,
tika-s0519t:378_11: ettāvatā kho bho ayaṃ attā paramadiṭṭhadhammanibbānappatto hoti,
tika-s0519t:378_13: Yathā taṃ sīhasaddoti yathā “sīho māṇavako”tiādinā māṇavakādīsu upacāravuttinā vattamāno migarāje bhūtatthavisaye diṭṭho,
tika-s0519t:378_14: evaṃ nibbānasaddopi kāmaguṇarūpajjhānasamaṅgitāsu upacāravuttiyā vattamāno katthaci visaye aviparītattho.
tika-s0519t:378_17: Hatthatale saāmalakaṃ viya ñeyyaṃ paccakkhato passantassa ekappamāṇassa satthuvacanamevettha pamāṇanti dassento “kiṃ vā etāya yutticintāyā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0519t:382_1: Adhicittaanuyuttānaṃ saddahanussahanupaṭṭhānasamādahanehi saddhādīsu upakarontesu eva paññā dassanakiccaṃ sādhetīti dassento “saddhā..pe…
tika-s0519t:382_3: No ca bhavaṅgāti tesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ pavattikāraṇatābhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0519t:383_0: 43. Tathā vuttoti “nissayo”ti vutto. Cetanāsīsena taṇhaṃ eva vadati cetanāsahacaraṇato.
tika-s0519t:384_2: tassa rāgassa sambandhinī sukhā vedanā vuttā tattha tassa anusayanato.
tika-s0519t:385_2: Na hi vedanā saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannā hoti. Taṇhāya,
tika-s0519t:385_6: Taṇhāya nissayabhāveti yadā taṇhā tesaṃ nissayo hoti.
tika-s0519t:386_0: Taṇhāya sesadhammānaṃ paccayabhāveti yadā sesadhammā taṇhāpaccayā honti.
tika-s0519t:387_1: gatīti peccabhavo”ti padadvayena vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ pāḷiyaṃ “āgatigatīpi na bhavantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:387_2: Idha huranti dvārārammaṇadhammā dassitā āsannadūrabhāvehi dvārārammaṇehi vinivattetvā gahitattā.
tika-s0519t:387_8: tesaṃ viññāṇādidhammānaṃ abhāvena anuppādadhammataṃ āpāditattāti attho.
tika-s0519t:387_9: “Anissitassa calitaṃ natthī”tiādinā paṭilomato paccayabhāvo dassitoti dassento pāḷiyaṃ “esevanto dukkhassāti
tika-s0519t:387_10: paṭiccasamuppādo”ti vatvā nanu “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādiko paṭiccasamuppādoti codanaṃ sandhāya yathāvuttassa
tika-s0519t:387_11: paṭiccasamuppādabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “so duvidho”tiādinā lokiyalokuttaravasena paṭiccasamuppādo vibhatto.
tika-s0519t:390_1: Sodheti nāmāti pucchitamatthaṃ hatthatale ṭhapitaāmalakaṃ viya paccakkhato dassento niggumbaṃ nijjaṭaṃ
tika-s0519t:390_3: evaṃ sodhento ca padassa atthena abhedopacāraṃ katvā “padaṃ sodheti”cceva vuccati.
tika-s0519t:390_10: Idha sodhanaṃ nāma paṭicchannarūpassa atthassa desanānubhāvena vivaṭabhāvakaraṇanti tamatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “aññāṇapakkhandāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:394_0: Taṃ taṃ phalanti nirayādiṃ taṃ taṃ phalaṃ.
tika-s0519t:394_3: Samānavasena missībhavati etāyāti hi yoni, upapatti.
tika-s0519t:395_0: Saṅkhāti paññā. Paññāpadhānā ca bhāvanāti āha “paṭisaṅkhāya paṭipakkhabhāvanāyā”ti.
tika-s0519t:397_5: Yena ca jīrīyatīti ekāhikādijarārogena jarīyatīti ca attho yujjati.
tika-s0519t:397_6: “Satavāraṃ tāpetvā tāpetvā udake pakkhipitvā uddhaṭasappi satadhotasappī”ti vadanti.
tika-s0519t:397_8: Keci nhāruṃ apanetvā sukkaṃ sattamaṃ dhātuṃ vadanti.
tika-s0519t:397_11: Vatthusaṅkhāto hi āhāro pariṇāmaṃ gacchanto pāṇabhakkhagahaṇipadaniya muttakarīsabhāvehi viya attanāpi
tika-s0519t:397_12: visadisarasasaṅkhātaṃ visuṃbhāvaṃ nibbattento tabbhāvaṃ gacchatīti vuccati,
tika-s0519t:399_5: yāthāvasaraso yāthāvasaraso eva lakkhitabbattā lakkhaṇanti yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-s0519t:399_6: Atha vā yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇanti aviparītaṃ attano pavattisaṅkhātaṃ kiccañceva pīḷanasaṅkhātaṃ lakkhaṇañca.
tika-s0519t:399_8: idaṃ lakkhaṇa”nti avijjāhetu ñātuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0519t:399_9: tabbisayañāṇuppattiṃ nivārentī chādetvā pariyonandhitvā tiṭṭhatīti vuttā.
tika-s0519t:399_16: Yadipi nirodhamagge avijjā ārammaṇaṃ na karoti,
tika-s0519t:399_17: te pana jānitukāmassa tappaṭicchādanavasena anirodhamaggesu nirodhamaggaggahaṇassa kāraṇabhāvena pavattamānā tattha uppajjatīti vuccati,
tika-s0519t:400_2: tattha attho eva atthatthoti atthassa aviparītatādassanatthaṃ dutiyena atthasaddena visesanaṃ.
tika-s0519t:400_5: Atthatthanti vā āmeḍitavacanaṃ sabbesaṃ atthānaṃ pākaṭakaraṇabhāvappakāsanatthaṃ,
tika-s0519t:401_7: Anavajjadhammānaṃ vijjā viya visesapaccayo na hotīti vindiyaṃ na vindati.
tika-s0519t:401_8: Ayaṃ avijjāya vemattatāti ayaṃ “dukkhe aññāṇa”ntiādinā kiccajātilakkhaṇehi vutto avijjāya aviseso.
tika-s0519t:403_1: Vibhūtaṃ samattikkantaṃ rūpasaññāsaṅkhātaṃ rūpaṃ etāyāti vibhūtarūpaṃ,
tika-s0519t:403_3: Na hi kāci arūpasamāpatti rūpasaññāsahagatā pavattīti.
tika-s0519t:404_0: Damathaṃ anupagacchanto duṭṭhasso khaluṅkasso. Uttaridamathāyāti ariyamaggadamathāya.
tika-s0519t:409_1: “Hinotī”ti padassa atthaṃ dassento “kāraṇabhāvaṃ gacchatī”ti āha anekatthattā dhātūnaṃ.
tika-s0519t:410_0: Avijjāyapi hetubhāveti ettha avijjā anantarāya avijjāya anantarasamanantarūpanissayanatthivigatāsevanapaccayehi,
tika-s0519t:410_2: asahajātāya upanissayakoṭiyā eva paccayo hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:410_3: Attano phalaṃ karotīti kāraṇanti āha “kāraṇabhāvo ca phalāpekkhāyā”ti.
tika-s0519t:412_0: Yo sabhāvoti puññādiabhisaṅkhārānaṃ yo abhisaṅkharaṇasabhāvo, so hetu.
tika-s0519t:412_3: Yo koci paccayoti janakādibhedaṃ yaṃ kiñci kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0519t:415_9: Pañca kāmaguṇā kāmataṇhāya kāraṇaṃ hoti ārammaṇapaccayatāya.
tika-s0519t:415_10: Nimittaggāho anubyañjanaggāhassa kāraṇaṃ hoti upanissayatāyāti evaṃ sesesupi yathārahaṃ kāraṇatā vattabbā.
tika-s0519t:422_5: Pacchimena tassa paṇītamahārahe jaṭāhi saddhiṃ dukkaratarataṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0519t:423_2: tasmā sā hāravibhaṅgavārassa ādimhi na paccāmaṭṭhāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0519t:423_3: Hārasampātavāro pana taṃ payojetīti yasmā pana hārasampātavāro taṃ gāthaṃ payojeti yathāvutteneva kāraṇena,
tika-s0519t:424_5: Atthato pana saññādayo eva rūpādivisayaṃ viparītākārena gaṇhante vipallāsoti dassento “saññāvipallāso”tiādimāha.
tika-s0519t:425_0: Indajālādivasena maṇiādiākārena upaṭṭhahante upādānakkhandhapañcake ahaṃmamādikāraṇatāya niruttinayena
tika-s0519t:426_5: Evaṃ santepi purimānaṃ dvinnaṃ viparītasaññānaṃ taṇhā,
tika-s0519t:426_11: evaṃ diṭṭhisīsena avijjāyapi gahaṇaṃ siyāti āha “diṭṭhisīsena avijjā vuttā”ti.
tika-s0519t:426_15: na tathā taṇhāti dassento “moho visesapaccayo”ti āha.
tika-s0519t:427_2: Teneva hi “so atītaṃ rūpaṃ attato samanupassati”cceva vuttaṃ,
tika-s0519t:427_23: “Arakkhitena cittenā”ti pāḷiṃ nikkhipitvā vipallāsamukheneva desanāya niddhāriyamānattā vuttaṃ “yathānusandhināva gāthaṃ niṭṭhapetu”nti.
tika-s0519t:428_1: Tassa hi vase ṭhito sesamārānaṃ hatthagato evāti.
tika-s0519t:429_1: So hi kilesabandhanabhūte attano samārakaparise maññati.
tika-s0519t:430_0: Mohasampayogato cittaṃ “mūḷha”nti vuttanti rattaduṭṭhānampi mūḷhatāya sabbhāve “mūḷha”nti visuṃ vacanaṃ
tika-s0519t:430_1: āveṇikamohavasena vuttanti dassento “dvinnaṃ momūhacittuppādānaṃ vasenā”ti āha.
tika-s0519t:430_2: Evanti evaṃ rāgādiakusalappattiyā kusalabhaṇḍacchedanato arakkhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti,
tika-s0519t:430_3: sabbopi micchābhiniveso ettheva saṅgahaṃ samosaraṇaṃ gacchatīti āha “micchādiṭṭhi …pe…
tika-s0519t:431_2: Nimittaggāhīti “itthī”ti vā puriso”ti vā “subha”nti vā “asubha”nti vā parikappitanimittaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-s0519t:431_4: Anubyañjanaggāhīti hatthapādahasitakathitādippabhede kilesānaṃ anu anu byañjanato anubyañjanasaññite ākāre gaṇhāti,
tika-s0519t:431_11: tamenaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ cakkhudvāraṃ asaṃvutaṃ satikavāṭena apihitaṃ katvā vattantaṃ,
tika-s0519t:431_14: asamapekkhane moho micchābhinivese micchādiṭṭhīti evaṃ abhijjhābyāpādā,
tika-s0519t:431_15: aññe ca lāmakaṭṭhena pāpakā akosallasambhūtaṭṭhena akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ anu anu pavatteyyuṃ.
tika-s0519t:432_0: Tassa saṃvarāya na paṭipajjatīti tassa cakkhudvārassa saṃvarāya satikavāṭena pidahanatthaṃ na paṭipajjati.
tika-s0519t:432_1: Sā pana appaṭipatti cakkhundriyassa anārakkhāsaṃvarassa anuppādoti dassento “na rakkhati…pe…
tika-s0519t:432_3: Javane uppajjamānopi hi asaṃvaro tena dvārena pavattanato “cakkhundriyāsaṃvaro”tveva vuccatīti.
tika-s0519t:432_5: “Pubbantakappanavasena cā”tiādinā saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassento “saṅkhepato ca vitthāro
tika-s0519t:432_6: añño”ti katvā taṃ samuccinanto “yā ca kho imā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0519t:434_0: Yadipi desanāhārasampātapāḷiyaṃ “tasmā rakkhitacittassā”ti gāthā sarūpato na gahitā,
tika-s0519t:434_1: atthato pana “tesaṃ bhagavā pariññāyā”tiādinā gahitā evāti tassā gahitabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “kathaṃ desetī”ti
tika-s0519t:435_0: Yonisomanasikārena kammaṃ karontoti “so ‘idaṃ dukkha’nti yoniso manasi karotī”tiādinā nayena vipassanāsaṅkhātena
tika-s0519t:435_7: itarattha dve tissopīti dassento āha “yathāsambhavaṃ tividhadukkhatāyogenā”ti.
tika-s0519t:438_1: Kusaladhammārammaṇāti kusaladhamme uddissa pavattimattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0519t:438_2: na tesaṃ ārammaṇapaccayataṃ idha “kusalā dhammā”ti lokuttaradhammānaṃ adhippetattā.
tika-s0519t:438_3: Na hi kadāci anupādāniyā dhammā upādānārammaṇā honti.
tika-s0519t:438_7: Kathaṃ pana kusalabhāvoti “kusalā”ti vacanamattaṃ gahetvā codeti,
tika-s0519t:438_10: “Mānopi duvidho”tiādinā mānassa ca tassā taṇhāya ca sevitabbabhāvo akusalānaṃ pahānāya,
tika-s0519t:439_0: Nekkhammassitaṃ domanassaṃ nāma “ariyabhūmiṃ pāpuṇituṃ nāsakkhi”nti anusocato uppannaṃ domanassanti sambandho.
tika-s0519t:439_2: pihaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā chasu dvāresu iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate aniccādivasena vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvāti yojanā.
tika-s0519t:439_3: Iṭṭhārammaṇañcettha yathāvuttaanusocanadomanassuppattīnaṃ yathābhiniviṭṭhassa ārammaṇassa aniṭṭhatāyāti dassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0519t:439_5: Vipassanādivinimuttā vā paṭhamajjhānādivasena vuttā kusalā dhammā idha nekkhammaṃ.
tika-s0519t:439_7: Ādisaddena dutiyajjhānato paṭṭhāya yāva aggaphalā uparivisesā saṅgahitā.
tika-s0519t:440_7: assaddhiyādīhi pana aññesaṃ kilesānaṃ vidhamanampi paññāya eva hoti,
tika-s0519t:440_8: sā ca evaṃbhūtāti dassanatthaṃ “obhāsagataṃ kilesandhakāre na iñjatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:441_2: Iddhividhañāṇādikā cha abhiññā pākaṭā evāti “dve ca visese”ti vuttadhamme dassetuṃ “manomayiddhi,
tika-s0519t:441_11: Tattha ayonisomanasikāro akusalacittuppādo tappariyāpanno micchāvitakko vikkhepasahito evāti vuttaṃ “micchābhinivesahetutāya
tika-s0519t:442_2: Yathāha “tadapi tesaṃ bhavataṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ ajānataṃ apassataṃ vedayitaṃ taṇhāgatānaṃ paritassitavipphanditamevā”ti.
tika-s0519t:442_6: kāle ucchedanti taṃ taṃ diṭṭhiggahaṇaṃ pakkhandanto sattato paribbhaṭṭhaandho viya,
tika-s0519t:442_8: yante yuttagoṇo viya ca tathā tathā paribbhamati.
tika-s0519t:442_12: micchābhinivesahetutāya ca tassā dve pakkhāti ekadesasarūpekaseso katoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:443_7: Tā samatikkamatīti tā rūpasaññānānattasaññāyo ārammaṇehi saddhiṃ sammadeva atikkamati.
tika-s0519t:444_3: Abhijjhābyāpādappahānena saddhiṃ vīriyārambho upakārako samatho satipassaddhiyo parikkhāraṅgatā vuttā eva.
tika-s0519t:444_4: Satirahitaṃ sammasanaṃ nāma natthīti “yā upaṭṭhitā sati asammuṭṭhā,
tika-s0519t:445_1: Paccuppannasukhaāyatisukhavipākakiriyanirāmisaakāpurisasevitabhāvehi eva sesā pāḷiyaṃ etassa samādhissa santapaṇītatādivisesā vuttā,
tika-s0519t:445_2: tepi idha saṅgahitāti tesaṃ padānaṃ atthaṃ dassento “aṅgasantatāyā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0519t:445_10: Imassa pana arahattasamādhissa paṭippassaddhakilesattā na niggahetabbaṃ,
tika-s0519t:445_11: vāretabbañca atthīti so maggānantaraṃ samāpattikkhaṇeva appayogeneva adhigatattā,
tika-s0519t:445_12: ṭhitattā ca aparihānivasena vā adhigatattā nasasaṅkhāraniggayhavāritagato.
tika-s0519t:446_0: “Sativepullappatto”ti etena appavattamānāyapi satiyā satibahulatāya sato eva nāmāti dasseti.
tika-s0519t:447_2: Taṃ “pañcaṅgiko sammāsamādhī”ti samādhiaṅgabhāvena paññā uddiṭṭhāti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:447_4: Tattha “so imameva kāyaṃ vivekajena pītisukhena abhisandetī”tiādinā nayena pītiyā,
tika-s0519t:448_0: Samādhivasena samatho uddhaṭoti sabhāvavasena samatho uddhaṭo, na upakārakadhammavasenāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0519t:449_3: Ettha ca saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇabhaṅgurataṃ sammadeva passantassa na rāgo patiṭṭhaṃ labhatīti aniccānupassanā rāgacaritassa sappāyā vuttā,
tika-s0519t:449_4: tathā saṅkhārānaṃ sabhāvadukkhataṃ sammadeva passantassa pakatiyāpi dukkhitesu dukkhuppādanaṃ vaṇe khārodakasekasadisanti
tika-s0519t:449_5: na doso patiṭṭhaṃ labhatīti dukkhānupassanā dosacaritassa sappāyā vuttā,
tika-s0519t:449_6: tathā saṅkhāresu sammadeva ghanavinibbhoge kate attasuññatāya upaṭṭhahamānāya na moho patiṭṭhaṃ labhatīti
tika-s0519t:450_0: Khantibahulo uppannaṃ aratiṃ anabhiratiṃ abhibhuyya viharanto sukhena samādhiṃ adhigacchatīti khantippadhānatāpi
tika-s0519t:450_4: so nesaṃ kāyikassa payogassa samuṭṭhānavasena veditabbo.
tika-s0519t:451_1: “Vipassanāya vimuttādhigamo”ti iminā vipassanānubhāvena samucchedavimutti vikkhambhanavimutti viya samathānubhāvenāti dasseti.
tika-s0519t:452_3: Sodhentoti yathā saraṇādivisayā aññāṇādisaṃkilesā na pavattanti,
tika-s0519t:452_5: Paripūrentāti yathā sīlaṃ akhaṇḍādibhāvena paripuṇṇaṃ hoti anūnaṃ,
tika-s0519t:453_0: “Tathā paṭipajjanto”ti iminā satthu mahāpatikārabhāvo paripuṇṇo dassitoti paṭhamavāde “dassanābhūmiñca bhāvanābhūmiñcā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:454_1: Tathā paṭipannassāti yathā asubhajjhānādiṃ pādakaṃ katvā anāgāmimaggādiadhigamo hoti,
tika-s0519t:456_0: “Manussabhūto”ti idaṃ pubbāparāpekkhaṃ katvā “pitā manussabhūto khīṇāsavo”ti ca tathā “mātā manussabhūtā”ti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:458_0: Na uppajjantīti pana atthīti “na me ācariyo atthi,
tika-s0519t:458_1: sadiso me na vijjatī”tiādi imissā lokadhātuyā ṭhatvā vadantena bhagavatā “kiṃ panāvuso sāriputta,
tika-s0519t:458_2: atthetarahi añño samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā bhagavato samasamo sambodhiyanti evaṃ puṭṭho ahaṃ, bhante,
tika-s0519t:458_3: ‘no’ti vadeyya”nti vatvā tassa kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso,
tika-s0519t:458_4: yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā dve arahanto sammāsambuddhā”ti imaṃ suttaṃ dassentena dhammasenāpatināva buddhakhettabhūtaṃ
tika-s0519t:458_5: imaṃ lokadhātuṃ ṭhapetvā aññattha anuppatti vuttā hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0519t:459_0: Khettapariggaho kato nāma hoti “idaṃ buddhakhettaṃ nāmā”ti.
tika-s0519t:460_1: vuttanayena vā aññepi yathārahaṃ ṭhānāṭṭhānabhāvena pavattā.
tika-s0519t:460_2: Sattapaññattiyā upādānabhūtāti indriyabaddhe khandhe sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0519t:461_1: Phalassa paccakkhakāritāti “imassa kammassa idaṃ phala”nti taṃtaṃkammaphalāvabodho.
tika-s0519t:464_0: Tatthatatthagāminīti nirayādinibbānanti dvīsu gandhabbaṭṭhānesu tattha tattheva gamanasīlā.
tika-s0519t:465_0: Sañjīvo kāḷasuttaṃ saṅghāto roruvo mahāroruvo tāpano mahātāpano avīcīti ete aṭṭha mahānirayā.
tika-s0519t:465_2: ekekasmiṃ dvāre cattāro cattāro gūthanirayādayoti evaṃ soḷasa ussadaniraye vaṇṇenti.
tika-s0519t:466_0: Sakkasuyāmādiko jeṭṭhakadevarājā. Pajāpativaruṇaīsānādayo viya dutiyādiṭṭhānantarakārako paricārako.
tika-s0519t:467_8: Aññesu ca kāmapaṭisaṃyuttesu dhammesu vijjamānesu vitakke eva kāmasaddo dhātusaddo niruḷhoti veditabbo vitakkassa kāmasaṅkappavuttiyā sātisayattā.
tika-s0519t:469_2: Yathā gūthādīnaṃ sabhāvo eso yaṃ gūthādīheva saṃsandati,
tika-s0519t:471_0: Akusalassa kammassa katokāsatāya pāḷiyaṃ vuttattā “vipākāvaraṇena nivuta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:471_1: Taṃ pana nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ kammāvaraṇādīhipi nivutatāya icchitattā.
tika-s0519t:471_2: Tathā hi yathā devadattaṃ kokālikaṃ sunakkhattaṃ licchaviputtanti udāhaṭaṃ,
tika-s0519t:471_3: yadipi bhagavā paṭivedhassa aṭṭhānataṃ disvā nibbedhabhāgiyadesanaṃ na deseti,
tika-s0519t:471_4: vāsanābhāgiyaṃ pana tathārūpassa deseti evāti dassento “saccappaṭivedha”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0519t:471_6: Tassāpi bhagavā anāgate vāsanatthāya dhammaṃ desesi.
tika-s0519t:471_7: Satthā hi “anāgate tambapaṇṇidīpe sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhahissatī”ti tatthāyaṃ kulaghare nibbatto pabbajitvā
tika-s0519t:471_8: kāḷabuddharakkhitatthero nāma pabhinnapaṭisambhido mahākhīṇāsavo bhavissatīti idaṃ disvā dhammaṃ desesi,
tika-s0519t:473_1: Diṭṭhi panettha padhānabhāvena pāḷiyaṃ gahitā sīlabbataparāmāsassa adhippetattā.
tika-s0519t:473_4: Asampuṇṇattā eva hi tassa micchādiṭṭhikammasamādānassa tesaṃ bhagavā “cattārimāni, puṇṇa,
tika-s0519t:473_6: Tāya ca desanāya te taṃ diṭṭhiṃ paṭinissajjitvā sammatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
tika-s0519t:474_2: Tadeva paṭhamajjhānādīhi vuṭṭhahitvā dutiyajjhānādiadhigamassa paccayattā vuṭṭhānaṃ nāma hotīti āha “vuṭṭhānaṃ paguṇavodāna”nti.
tika-s0519t:474_4: Bhavaṅgacitte hi uppanne taṃsamaṅgisamāpattito vuṭṭhito nāma hoti.
tika-s0519t:475_0: Idaṃ vuṭṭhānanti idaṃ yathāvuttaṃ kosallaṃ vuṭṭhānahetubhāvato vuṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0519t:475_1: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “vodānampi tamhā tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhāna”nti.
tika-s0519t:475_2: Imāya pana vuṭṭhānapāḷiyā asaṅgahitattā “nirodhasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhānaṃ pāḷimuttakavuṭṭhānaṃ nāmā”ti sammohavinodaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:475_3: Ye pana “nirodhato phalasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhāna”nti pāḷiyaṃ natthīti vadeyyuṃ,
tika-s0519t:475_4: te “nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti imāya pāḷiyā paṭisedhetabbā.
tika-s0519t:476_1: Ayaṃ cassa āsayoti ettha āsayajānanādinā yehi indriyehi yehi paroparehi sattā kalyāṇapāpāsayādikā honti,
tika-s0519t:477_0: Thāmagatoti ettha thāmagamanaṃ nāma aññesaṃ asādhāraṇo kāmarāgādīnaṃ eva āveṇiko sabhāvo veditabbo,
tika-s0519t:478_3: Sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ viya hi sabbaṃ bhagavato ñāṇaṃ parikammanirapekkhanti.
tika-s0519t:479_14: Divusaddaṃ akkharacintakā kīḷādīsu paṭhantīti vuttaṃ “taṃ sabbaṃ saddasatthānusārena veditabba”nti.
tika-s0519t:479_15: Purimā hi tayo atthā kīḷatthassa vasena,
tika-s0519t:482_2: Taṃ diṭṭhinti yena micchāgāhena ariye anuddhaṃseti,
tika-s0519t:482_5: yathā nāma hetusampannassa bhikkhuno visuddhaṃ sīlaṃ,
tika-s0519t:482_6: samādhiñca sampādetvā ṭhitassa dandho satuppādo khippābhiññāya diṭṭheva dhamme aññā,
tika-s0519t:482_8: Evamevaṃ yo ariyūpavādī yathāvuttacittadiṭṭhīhi apakkamitvā appatirūpaṃ sabhāvaṃ “mayā, bhante,
tika-s0519t:482_9: tumhākaṃ upari vutta’nti accayadesanāya te na khamāpeti,
tika-s0519t:482_11: Tesu pasannacittassa khamāpanañhettha tesaṃ vācādīnaṃ pahānaṃ paṭinissaggova.
tika-s0519t:482_12: Ito sāvajjataraṃ nāma aññaṃ natthi sabbānatthavidhānato,
tika-s0519t:483_0: Kāyassa bhedāti idha kāyasaddo attabhāvapariyāyoti āha “upādinnakkhandhapariccāgā”ti.
tika-s0519t:484_0: Vuttavipariyāyenāti “suṭṭhu caritaṃ, sobhanaṃ vā carita”ntiādinā. Hanananti ghātanaṃ.
tika-s0519t:485_8: Yadipi hi jhānādipaccavekkhaṇāñāṇaṃ idha chaṭṭhaṃ balanti tassa savitakkasavicāratā vuttā,
tika-s0519t:485_9: tathāpi jhānādīhi vinā paccavekkhaṇā natthīti jhānādisahagataṃ ñāṇaṃ tadantogadhaṃ katvā evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:485_10: Atha vā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ jhānādikiccaṃ viya na sabbaṃ balakiccaṃ kātuṃ sakkotīti dassetuṃ “jhānaṃ hutvā appetuṃ,
tika-s0519t:485_11: iddhi hutvā vikubbituñca na sakkotī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0519t:485_12: na pana kassaci balassa jhānaiddhibhāvoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:488_1: Paṭipakkhapaṭibāḷhā kusalā dhammā uppajjitumeva na sakkonti,
tika-s0519t:488_2: uppannāpi sammadeva attano kiccaṃ kātuṃ asamatthatāya anuppannasadisāti paṭipakkhanivāraṇena kusalānaṃ
tika-s0519t:488_7: tena rakkhitacittatā vuttanayena ekantato sammāsaṅkappagocaratāya ca saṃvattatīti dasseti.
tika-s0519t:488_11: Sabbopi cāyamatthoti “sammāsaṅkappagocaro sammādiṭṭhi bhavissatī”tiādīsu attho yuttiyā yutto eva anarūpakāraṇabhāvato.
tika-s0519t:491_1: Yasmā vā saṃkilesato rakkhitacittassa tīṇi sucaritāni pāripūriṃ gacchanti,
tika-s0519t:491_3: sā kāyasucaritādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sucaritānaṃ padaṭṭhānanti evamettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0519t:492_0: Tato evāti kāraṇaggahaṇena phalassa gahitattā eva.
tika-s0519t:494_1: Pāḷiyaṃ pañcindriyāni tīhi khandhehi saṅgahitānīti ettha saddhāvīriyasatindriyehi pātimokkhādi tividhaṃ sīlaṃ gahitaṃ sodhetabbattā.
tika-s0519t:498_0: Idāni yasmā suttesu hārānaṃ yojanānayadassanattā hārasampātadesanā hāravibhaṅgadesanā viya na hārasarūpamattadassanattā,
tika-s0519t:498_1: tasmā peṭakopadese āgatanayānusārena aparehi vipariyāyehi hārasampātayojanāvidhiṃ dassento “apicā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0519t:498_2: Tattha vijjāvijjāya kusalākusalacittappavattiyā alobhādosalobhadosāpi paramparabhāvena pavattanti nidānabhāvatoti dassento “cha dhammā…pe…
tika-s0519t:498_5: evaṃ attano vasevattanenāpi pubbaṅgamatā labbhatevāti vuttaṃ “sādhipatikānaṃ adhipati,
tika-s0519t:501_6: nekkhammacchandena upanissayabhūtena mano tassa pubbaṅgamo hoti.
tika-s0519t:502_4: so ca manassa tesaṃ sahajātādinā paccayabhāvo evāti vuttaṃ “manomayāti…pe…
tika-s0519t:502_9: yadipi tesaṃ dhammānaṃ chandādayopi paccayā eva,
tika-s0519t:502_10: indriyādipaccayena pana savisesaṃ paccayabhūtassa manasseva vaseneva vuttaṃ “manomayā”ti.
tika-s0519t:502_11: Tattha chandasamudānītāti yathāvuttanekkhammādichandena sammā uddhamuddhaṃ nītā,
tika-s0519t:502_18: Idaṃ manokammanti kāyaṅgavācaṅgacopanaṃ akatvā saddhāsamannāgatena pasannena manasā pavattaṃ idaṃ kusalaṃ manokammaṃ.
tika-s0519t:503_0: Bhāsatīti avisaṃvādanādinā vācaṅgacopanāvasena pavattentiyā vacīviññattiyā sādhetabbaṃ sādhetīti attho,
tika-s0519t:503_6: paresañca hitāhitāni kāraṇākāraṇehi kāyaṅgacopanāvasena pavattentiyā kāyaviññattiyā sādhetabbaṃ sādhetīti attho,
tika-s0519t:503_10: Kammapathavasena gayhamāne pāṇātipātādivasena taṃ tividhaṃ hoti.
tika-s0519t:503_14: Bhāsati vā karoti vā kevalaṃ manasā pavattatīti aniyamattho vā- saddo.
tika-s0519t:504_2: Nanu tattha dānādimayaṃ tividhameva puññakiriyavatthu vuttanti? Saccaṃ,
tika-s0519t:505_0: “Sukhamanvetī”ti saṅkhepena vuttaṃ sukhānugamaṃ vitthārena dassento “idhassu puriso”tiādimāha.
tika-s0519t:506_1: Ādito vavatthāpitesu khandhādīsu khandhamukhena saccānaṃ kathitattā sattānaṃ bhinnarucibhāvato nānānayehi vipassanābhūmikosallatthaṃ,
tika-s0519t:506_4: Saccamukhena assādādike niddhāretvā desanāhārasampātaṃ yojetuṃ “tattha samudayenā”tiādimāha,
tika-s0519t:507_4: tassa pasādassa kiccaṃ mane āropetvā āha “akālusiyato,
tika-s0519t:507_6: Tathā sādiyanatoti vācāya vattabbaṃ avatvāva phassasādiyanato anujānato.
tika-s0519t:507_7: Dutiye tathā sādiyanatoti kāyena kātabbaṃ yathā kataṃ hoti,
tika-s0519t:507_17: Yo hi pasannamano tena yaṃ bhāsanaṃ,
tika-s0519t:507_19: tato eva naṃ sukhamanvetīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0519t:507_22: Kammato vipākuppattiphaladānasamatthabhāvena kammassa nibbattattā vipākasseva anibbattattāti āha “katū…pe…
tika-s0519t:507_23: anvetīti vutta”nti kāraṇāyatta vuttitoti katabhāvahetukattā kammassāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0519t:508_1: Sahajātadhammānañhi taṃsampayuttassa manassa vasena pubbaṅgamatā idhādhippetā.
tika-s0519t:508_6: Nanu vibhajjabyākaraṇesu tesaṃ sāvakānaṃ saddhā uppajjatīti?
tika-s0519t:508_8: tadākārā pana akusalā dhammā tathā vuccantīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:508_10: Sukhaṃ anvetīti yujjati kammassa phaladāne samatthabhāvato.
tika-s0519t:508_11: Yathā hi kataṃ kammaṃ phaladānasamatthaṃ hoti,
tika-s0519t:509_2: Te pana yasmā cittaṃ nissāyeva pavattanti,
tika-s0519t:509_5: Kusalapakkhassa padaṭṭhānanti ettha kusalo tāva phasso kusalassa vedanākkhandhassa saññākkhandhassa saṅkhārakkhandhassa sahajātādinā paccayo hoti. “Phuṭṭho,
tika-s0519t:509_12: Kāmāvacarā hi kusalā dhammā yathārahaṃ catubhūmakassāpi kusalassa paccayā honti,
tika-s0519t:510_0: “Pasannena manasā bhāsatī”ti vuttattā visesato sammāvācāpaccayaṃ bhāsanaṃ idhādhippetanti vuttaṃ “bhāsatīti sammāvācā”ti.
tika-s0519t:510_7: Yasmā pana ājīvaṭṭhamake sīle patiṭṭhitassa uppannānuppannānaṃ akusaladhammānaṃ pahānānuppādanāni,
tika-s0519t:510_9: tathā sammāvāyāme ṭhitasseva kāyādīsu subhasaññādividdhaṃsinī sammāsati sambhavati,
tika-s0519t:510_12: saddhāsādhano ca soti āha “taṃ sīlassa padaṭṭhāna”nti.
tika-s0519t:514_2: Tattha “nayidaṃ yathārutavasena gahetabba”nti suttassa neyyatthataṃ vatvā “yohī”tiādinā taṃ vivarati.
tika-s0519t:514_7: dhammañca pana adhammoti dīpanena lokassa sabbānatthabījabhūtesu sakalahitasukhupāyapaṭikkhepakesu titthakaresu
tika-s0519t:514_9: Yo hi loke appamattakampi puññaṃ kātukāmaṃ pāpikaṃ diṭṭhiṃ nissāya paṭibāhati,
tika-s0519t:514_11: kimaṅgaṃ pana ariyavinaye sammāpaṭipattiṃ paṭibāhantesūti dukkhaphalāva tattha sambhāvanāpasaṃsā payirupāsanā.
tika-s0519t:515_0: Idañhi suttanti “manopubbaṅgamā…pe…pada”nti paṭhamaṃ gāthaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0519t:517_0: Mahābhūtātīti itisaddo ādiattho, tena mahābhūtāvinābhāvī sabbo rūpadhammo saṅgayhati.
tika-s0519t:518_4: “Sukhamanvetī”ti pana yathādhippetatthaparisamāpananti vuttaṃ “padasuddhi ceva ārambhasuddhi cā”ti.
tika-s0519t:519_2: Vemattatā “manopubbaṅgamā”tiādinā sāmaññato vuttadhamme pasādo dhāraṇāya nivattetvā pasannasaṅkhāte visese avaṭṭhāpanato.
tika-s0519t:519_5: assaddhiyaṃ viya lūkhasabhāvaṃ dosaṃ vinodetīti āha “byāpādavikkhambhanato”ti.
tika-s0519t:520_4: Tathā phassoti yathā vedanādīnaṃ iṭṭhārammaṇādayo paccayo,
tika-s0519t:520_5: evaṃ phassopīti paccayatāsāmaññameva upasaṃharati tathā- saddo.
tika-s0519t:520_6: Vedanādīnanti hi vedanādayo tayo khandhā gahitā.
tika-s0519t:521_3: “Anuppannāna”ntiādinā bhāvanāpahānasamāropanāni dassento nibbedhabhāgiyavasena gāthāya atthaṃ vicinitvā samāropeti,
tika-s0519t:521_4: evampi sakkā yojetunti vāsanābhāgiyavasena padaṭṭhānaniddese udāharīyati.
tika-s0519t:522_0: Evaṃ “manopubbaṅgamā dhammā”ti gāthāya vasena hārasampātayojanāvidhiṃ dassetvā idāni gāthāntarena dassetuṃ “tathā dadato puñña”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0519t:524_0: Pariccāgasīlo alobhajjhāsayo kāmesu ādīnavadassāvī sammadeva sīlaṃ paripūretīti āha “dadato…pe…
tika-s0519t:525_0: Dadatoti maggasahagatena alobhena sadevakassa lokassa abhayadānaṃ dadato.
tika-s0519t:525_2: Saṃyamatoti maggapariyāpannehi sammāvācākammantājīvehi diṭṭhekaṭṭhādisaṃkilesato maggasaṃyamena saṃyamantassa.
tika-s0519t:525_5: Jahāti pāpakanti tehi tehi maggehi taṃ taṃ pahātabbaṃ pāpadhammaṃ odhiso jahāti samucchindati.
tika-s0519t:526_0: “Dadato”tiādinā pubbe avibhāgena kusalamūlāni uddhaṭānīti idāni vibhāgena tāni uddharanto “lokiyakusalamūla”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0519t:529_0: Puññe kathite puññaphalampi kathitameva hotīti vuttaṃ “dadato…pe…
tika-s0519t:529_2: Saccakammaṭṭhānena vinā saṃkilesappahānaṃ natthīti dassento āha “kusalo…pe…
tika-s0519t:530_0: Verasaddo adinnādānādipāpadhammesupi niruḷhoti vuttaṃ “evaṃ sabbānipi sikkhāpadāni vitthāretabbānī”ti.
tika-s0519t:531_1: kāraṇaggahaṇena vā phalaṃ gahitanti āha “dve sugatiyo”tiādi.
tika-s0519t:531_4: “sampattidvayaṃ icchantena dānādīsu appamattena bhavitabba”nti ayamettha bhagavato āṇattīti imamatthaṃ
tika-s0519t:532_5: itare ca vicayahārapadatthā atthato vicitā eva hontīti.
tika-s0519t:533_3: vacīsacce ca tiṭṭhato saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ pāripūriṃ gacchatīti vuttaṃ “saṃyama…pe…
tika-s0519t:533_5: Kosallayogato ca pāpappahānato ca paññāpāripūriṃ gacchatīti vuttaṃ “kusalo…pe…
tika-s0519t:533_7: Anavasesarāgādīsu pahīnesu upasamo upaṭṭhito nāma hotīti vuttaṃ “rāga…pe…
tika-s0519t:535_5: anupādāparinibbānanti imesaṃ paccavekkhaṇā imassa dānassa nidānanti ayamattho pāḷiyaṃ niruḷhova.
tika-s0519t:536_0: Paṭipakkhaniddesena samudayoti desanatthaṃ paṭipakkhaniddesanena niddhārito ayaṃ macchariyādisaṃkilesapakkhiko samudayo.
tika-s0519t:536_2: dānādīhīti yehi alobhādīhi dānādayo dhammā sambhavanti,
tika-s0519t:536_3: tāni dānādiggahaṇeneva gahitānīti kusalamūlāni niddhāreti “imāni tīṇi kusalānī”ti.
tika-s0519t:537_7: Tena tathārūpena saṃyamena veraṃ na ciyateva.
tika-s0519t:537_8: Evaṃ sabbassa akusalassa pāpako vipākoti yojanā.
tika-s0519t:538_1: evaṃ pahānapaṭikkhepenapi parivattanaṃ dassetabbanti vuttaṃ “akusalo pana na jahātī”ti.
tika-s0519t:539_0: Kammaphalaṃ saddahanto dānakiriyāyaṃ padahanto yena vidhinā dānaṃ dātabbaṃ,
tika-s0519t:539_1: tattha satiṃ upaṭṭhapento cittaṃ samādahanto sammādiṭṭhiṃ purakkharonto dāne sammāpaṭipanno hotīti āha “dānaṃ nāma…pe… hotī”ti.
tika-s0519t:540_0: Bhāvanāpahānasamāropanāni pāḷiyaṃ sarūpato viññāyantīti padaṭṭhānavevacanasamāropanāni dassetuṃ “taṃ sīlassa padaṭṭhāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-s0519t:543_3: Na hi paṭivedhañāṇaṃ viya vipassanāñāṇaṃ paccakkhato pavattatīti.
tika-s0519t:543_7: Evañca katvā nandiyāvaṭṭādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ atthanayabhāvo samatthito hotīti.
tika-s0519t:543_8: Tathā hi atthavisesasarūpatāya tayo nayā “suttattho”ti vuttā,
tika-s0519t:543_10: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ tayoti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “paṭivijjhantānaṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-s0519t:543_11: Tattha ekameko saṃkilesavodānānaṃ vibhāgato dvisaṅgahoti yojanā.
tika-s0519t:543_12: Catuchaaṭṭhadiso cāti na paccekaṃ te nandiyāvaṭṭādayo catuchaaṭṭhadisā,
tika-s0519t:544_0: Tathā cāti yathāvuttassa atthassa upacayena samatthanā.
tika-s0519t:544_1: Pubbā koṭi na paññāyatīti ettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ,
tika-s0519t:544_4: yaṃ lobho sahate nara”ntiādi vacanato kāmataṇhāpi paṭicchādanasabhāvā,
tika-s0519t:544_9: Evaṃ santepi taṇhāya bandhanaṭṭho sātisayo apekkhitabhāvatoti imamatthaṃ dassento “tathāpi…pe…
tika-s0519t:545_3: tato so avindiyaṃ vindatīti avijjāti vuccati.
tika-s0519t:546_1: jānantīti attanā anubhūyamānaṃ tathā tathā upaṭṭhitaṃ kāyikacetasikadukkhaṃ,
tika-s0519t:546_4: Sabhāgavisabhāgapaṭipajjitabbākārato tattha tesaṃ ñāṇaṃ natthevātidassento “idaṃ dukkha”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0519t:546_6: Kā pana kathāti pacurajanasādhāraṇe lokiyepi nāma atthe yesaṃ ñāṇassa paṭighāto,
tika-s0519t:546_7: paramagambhīre ariyānaṃ eva visayabhūte lokuttare nivattinivattihetusaṅkhāte atthe kā nāma kathā,
tika-s0519t:546_9: Aṭṭhasamāpattipabhedassa kevalassa samathassa tādise kāle bāhirakānañca ijjhanato “vipassanādhiṭṭhāna”nti visesitaṃ.
tika-s0519t:547_1: So hi puttamukhadassane asati saṃsāro ucchijjeyyāti bhāyati.
tika-s0519t:549_0: Ete abhayaṃ bhāyanti, sammūḷhā caturo janā”ti. ;
tika-s0519t:550_0: Tadabhiññāti taṃ yathāvuttaantadvayaṃ abhijānanti guṇaṃ āropetvā jānantīti tadabhiññā.
tika-s0519t:551_6: Taṇhācarito pana yathāupaṭṭhitaṃ rūpaṃ taṇhāvatthuṃ katvā attaniyābhinivesena abhinivisantā tadaññameva attato samanupassanti.
tika-s0519t:551_11: Diṭṭhiyā parikappito attādi eva paramatthato nupalabbhati,
tika-s0519t:551_12: diṭṭhi pana labbhatevāti āha “satī vā vijjamānā”ti.
tika-s0519t:556_1: Ettāvatā nandiyāvaṭṭassa bhūmiracanavasena saṃkilesapakkho dassitoti āha “tattha diṭṭhicaritotiādinā vodānapakkhaṃ dassetī”ti.
tika-s0519t:556_2: “Yasmā sallekhe tibbagāravo”ti iminā tattha tibbagāravattā saṃlekhānusantatavuttinā bhavatīti dasseti.
tika-s0519t:558_3: Dukkhāpaṭipadādivibhāgena maggo eva idha vuttoti āha “paṭipadā hi maggo”ti catuddisāsaṅkhātaṃ magganti catuddisāsaṅkhātaṃ pavattanupāyaṃ.
tika-s0519t:560_4: Vipariyesaggāhavasena hi ādīnavesu eva saṃyojaniyesu dhammesu assādānupassitā.
tika-s0519t:560_5: Na hi yathābhūtañāṇe sati tathā sambhavo.
tika-s0519t:561_3: kāyekadese ca kabaḷīkāre āhāre pavatto eva hotīti vuttaṃ “paṭhame āhāre visayabhūte paṭhamo vipallāso pavattatī”ti.
tika-s0519t:561_4: Tathā vedanāyaṃ pavattamāno dutiyavipallāso tappaccaye phassāhāre,
tika-s0519t:561_6: dhammesu pavattamāno catutthavipallāso tappaccaye viññāṇāhāre pavatto eva hotīti vuttaṃ “catutthe āhāre catuttho vipallāso”ti.
tika-s0519t:561_11: Paṭhame āhāre visayabhūteti ca paṭhame āhāre chandarāgassa visayabhāvaṃ patte,
tika-s0519t:561_16: Itare upādānāni pavattanteva appahīnattāti āha “sesapadesupi eseva nayo”ti.
tika-s0519t:561_17: Yasmā ca upādānādīsu appahīnesupi yogādayo pavattanteva yathārahaṃ taṃsabhāvattā,
tika-s0519t:561_19: tasmā vuttaṃ pāḷiyaṃ “paṭhame upādāne paṭhamo yogo”tiādi.
tika-s0519t:562_4: tesaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ anavabujjhantassāti attho.
tika-s0519t:562_5: Tibbo bahalo chandarāgo hoti taṇhācaritabhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0519t:562_6: Iti upakkilesassa diṭṭhābhinivesassa hetubhāvatoti imamatthaṃ sandhāyāha “vuttanayenevā”ti.
tika-s0519t:563_4: Labbhamāne hi ujuke atthe kiṃ pariyāyakathāyāti.
tika-s0519t:563_5: Chandarāgo vā tattha atthasiddhoti evampettha attho vutto.
tika-s0519t:563_6: Na hi tattha asati chandarāge vipallāso sambhavati.
tika-s0519t:563_10: Tathā hi sāti nāma bhikkhu kevaṭṭaputto “taṃyeva viññāṇaṃ sandhāvati saṃsaratī”ti tattha niccābhinivesaṃ saṃvedesi.
tika-s0519t:563_11: Yebhuyyena saṅkhāresu attasaññitā diṭṭhigatikānaṃ “cetanā attā”tiādidiṭṭhiparidīpanesu veditabbā.
tika-s0519t:563_14: sukhanti daḷhaṃ gaṇhātī”ti iminā sīlabbatupādānaṃ idha bhavupādānanti dasseti.
tika-s0519t:564_1: Paṭhame yoge ṭhitoti paṭhame yoge patiṭṭhito.
tika-s0519t:564_2: Appahīnā hi kilesā kammavaṭṭādīnaṃ kāraṇabhūtā taṃsamaṅgino sattassa patiṭṭhāti vuccanti.
tika-s0519t:564_4: Bhavapatthanāya bhavadiṭṭhibhavarāgavasena piyāyitassa vatthuno vipariṇāmaññathābhāve domanassuppattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “bhavarāga…pe…
tika-s0519t:565_2: Cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhantā āsavānaṃ uppattihetu hontīti sambandho.
tika-s0519t:565_3: Pariyuṭṭhānappattā ekacce kilesā visesato āsavuppattihetu hontīti dassanatthaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ uppaṭipāṭivacanaṃ.
tika-s0519t:565_5: Tabbisayabahule bhave patthetīti yathā mānusakehi kāmehi nibbinnarūpā devūpapatti.
tika-s0519t:565_8: Ekaccā hi diṭṭhi ekaccassa diṭṭhābhinivesassa kāraṇaṃ hoti,
tika-s0519t:565_12: avijjāsavo uppajjatī”ti idaṃ saccābhinivesassa phalabhūtaṃ avijjāsavaṃ dasseti ekantavassimeghavuṭṭhānena viya mahoghappavatti.
tika-s0519t:565_13: Avijjāsavo siddho hoti vuṭṭhihetukamahoghasiddhiyā uparimeghavuṭṭhānaṃ viya.
tika-s0519t:566_2: Cittassa abbhantarasaṅkhātaṃ hadayanti vipākacittappavattiṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0519t:567_2: Byañjanena viya bhojanassa ārammaṇassa abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ visesāpādanaṃ upasecanaṃ,
tika-s0519t:567_3: nandī sappītikataṇhā upasecanaṃ etassāti nandūpasecanaṃ upasecanabhūtāyapi nandiyā rāgasallaupanisato.
tika-s0519t:567_4: Upasitte pana vattabbameva natthīti dassetuṃ pāḷiyā “rāgasallena nandūpasecanena viññāṇenā”ti vuttanti
tika-s0519t:567_5: tamatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ “kena pana taṃ nandūpasecana”nti pucchati.
tika-s0519t:568_0: Rāgasallenāti hetumhi karaṇavacananti dassento “rāgasallena hetubhūtenā”ti āha.
tika-s0519t:569_3: tathāpi aññamaññānuppavesato ekasmiṃ naye siddhe itarepi siddhā eva hontīti imassa visesassa dassanatthaṃ “āhārādayo…pe…
tika-s0519t:569_5: Vakkhamāne vā akusalamūlataṇhādike ādisaddena saṅgahetvā “āhārādayo”ti vadanto “nayāna”nti bahuvacanamāha.
tika-s0519t:569_6: Ekassa atthassāti rāgacaritassa upakkilesatāsaṅkhātassa ekassa payojanassa.
tika-s0519t:569_8: na byañjanameva gahitanti suttapadāni aññamaññapariyāyavacanāni yathārahaṃ taṇhāvatthūnaṃ tattha kathitattā vuttaṃ “savatthukā taṇhā vuttā”ti.
tika-s0519t:569_11: savatthukā diṭṭhi ca vuttā”ti imamatthaṃ sandhāyāha “vuttanayānusārenā”ti.
tika-s0519t:570_1: Evañcetanti yadi taṃtaṃanupassanābahulassa vasena purimāhāradvayādīsu vimokkhamukhavisesaniddhāraṇaṃ kataṃ,
tika-s0519t:570_6: yathā ariyamaggānaṃ odhiso kilesappajahanato pahātabbesu dhammesu niyamo atthi,
tika-s0519t:571_4: manosañcetanāhāre catutthaviññāṇaṭṭhitiyaṃ anattalakkhaṇaṃ supākaṭanti tissannaṃ anupassanānaṃ pavattimukhatāya
tika-s0519t:571_8: Iti pavattimukhatāya ca ujuvipaccanīkatāya ca ime dhammā yathārahaṃ appaṇihitādivimokkhamukhehi pariññeyyā,
tika-s0519t:571_13: Tatiyasaññādayo niccābhinivesatannimittāhi aniccānupassanāya paṭipakkhabhāvato animittavimokkhamukhena pahātabbā.
tika-s0519t:571_14: Catutthasaññādayo attābhinivesatannittāhi anattānupassanāya paṭipakkhabhāvato suññatavimokkhamukhena pahātabbā.
tika-s0519t:572_3: niddosatāya ca seṭṭhā vihārāti catasso appamaññā brahmavihārā,
tika-s0519t:572_4: catasso phalasamāpattiyo ariyavihārā “ārakā kilesehi ariyānaṃ vihārā”ti.
tika-s0519t:574_5: adhiṭṭhānamattameva vā taṃ saccanti evaṃ karaṇādhikaraṇabhāvatthā paccayavasena veditabbā samānādhikaraṇasamāsapakkhe.
tika-s0519t:574_8: te ca kho sīlādivasena ca veditabbā.
tika-s0519t:574_12: pāṇina”nti hi imāya gāthāya saṅgahitā anattaparihāramukhena sattānaṃ abhayā nibbānasampattisukhāvahā cattāro dhammā idha “sukhabhāgiyā”ti vuttāti.
tika-s0519t:575_3: Satipi ca sabbāhi paṭipadāhi sabbesaṃ satipaṭṭhānānaṃ niyamābhāve nānantarikabhāvena desanākkamenevettha nesaṃ ayamanukkamo katoti veditabbo.
tika-s0519t:575_4: Atha vā kāyavedanāsu subhasukhasaññānaṃ dubbiniveṭhiyatāya asubhadukkhānupassanānaṃ kiccasiddhito purimena
tika-s0519t:575_7: Tāni hi purimesu satipaṭṭhānesu katakammassa icchitabbāni.
tika-s0519t:575_8: Atha vā yathā taṇhācaritadiṭṭhicaritānaṃ mandatikkhapaññānaṃ vasena catasso paṭipadā yojitā,
tika-s0519t:575_9: evaṃ cattāri satipaṭṭhānāni sambhavantīti dassetuṃ paṭipadāsatipaṭṭhānānaṃ ayamanukkamo kato.
tika-s0519t:576_0: “Tathā”ti iminā yathā samānapaṭipakkhatāya paṭhamassa satipaṭṭhānassa bhāvanā paṭhamassa jhānassa visesāvahā,
tika-s0519t:576_1: evaṃ pītisahagatādisamānatāya dutiyasatipaṭṭhānādibhāvanā dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ visesāvahāti imamatthaṃ upasaṃharati.
tika-s0519t:576_5: Cittassa abhippamodanaggahaṇañcettha nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ paṭisaṃvedanasamādahanavimocanānampi vasena pavattiyā icchitabbattā.
tika-s0519t:577_0: Rūpāvacarasamāpattīnanti ettha paṭiladdhamattaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ paṭhamajjhānasamāpattiyā paguṇavasībhāvāpādanassa paccayo hoti,
tika-s0519t:577_2: Itarāsaṃ pana adhiṭṭhānabhāvena paramparāya paccayo hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:578_0: Dibbavihārādike cattāro vihāre padaṭṭhānaṃ katvā nānāsantānesu uppannāya vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāya yathākkamaṃ
tika-s0519t:578_1: anuppannākusalānuppādanādivasena pavattavisayaṃ sandhāya pāḷiyaṃ “paṭhamo vihāro bhāvito bahulīkato”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:578_3: Ariyavihāre ca heṭṭhime nissāya uparimaggādhigamāya vāyamantassa ayaṃ nayo labbhati.
tika-s0519t:578_4: Maggapariyāpannasseva vā sammappadhānassa nānāsantānikassa yathāvuttavipassanāgamanena taṃtaṃkiccādikassa vasenetaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:578_5: Sakkā hi vipassanāgamanena saddhindriyāditikkhatāviseso viya vīriyassa kiccavisesavisayo maggo viññātuṃ.
tika-s0519t:579_0: Tathā sikhāppattaupekkhāsatipārisuddhidibbavihāraṃ nissāya uppannaṃ paṭhamaṃ sammappadhānaṃ mānappahānaṃ ukkaṃseti,
tika-s0519t:579_3: santavimokkhasannissayena uppannaṃ catutthaṃ sammappadhānaṃ bhavūpasamaṃ ukkaṃsetīti dassetuṃ “paṭhamaṃ sammappadhāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:580_0: Pahīnamāno na visaṃvādeyyāti mānappahānaṃ saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ vaḍḍheti visaṃvādananimittasseva abhāvato.
tika-s0519t:580_1: Appahīnamāno hi mānanissayena kiñci visaṃvādeyya. Kāmālaye,
tika-s0519t:580_2: diṭṭhālaye ca samugghāṭite cāgapaṭipakkhassa avasaro eva natthīti ālayasamugghāto cāgādhiṭṭhānaṃ vaḍḍheti.
tika-s0519t:580_4: bhavasaṅkhāresu ossaṭṭhesu abhavūpasamassa okāsova natthīti mānappahānādayo saccādhiṭṭhānādike saṃvaḍḍhentīti dassetuṃ “mānappahāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:581_2: ñāṇuttaro cittaṃ attano vase vattento cittādhipateyyaṃ,
tika-s0519t:581_3: vūpasantasabhāvo upasamahetubhūtāya vīmaṃsāya vīmaṃsayato vīmaṃsādhipateyyaṃ samādhiṃ nibbattetīti saccādhiṭṭhānādipārisuddhichandasamādhiādīnaṃ
tika-s0519t:582_0: Dhammacchandabahulo chandasamādhimhi ṭhito iṭṭhāniṭṭhachaḷārammaṇāpāte anavajjasevī hoti.
tika-s0519t:582_1: Āraddhavīriyo vīriyasamādhimhi ṭhito saṃkilesapakkhassa santapanavaseneva puññaṃ paripūreti.
tika-s0519t:582_2: Cittaṃ attano vase vattento cittasamādhimhi ṭhito paññāya upakārānupakārake dhamme pariggaṇhanto buddhiṃ phātiṃ gamissati.
tika-s0519t:582_3: Vīmaṃsāsamādhimhi ṭhito dhammavicayabahulo upadhipaṭinissaggāvahameva paṭipattiṃ brūhetīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “chandasamādhi bhāvito”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:583_0: Dūrādūrapaccatthikanivāraṇe bahūpakāro indriyasaṃvaro mettāya visesuppattihetuto mettaṃ vaḍḍheti.
tika-s0519t:583_1: Tapena saṃkilesadhamme vikkhambhento vīriyādhiko paradukkhāpanayanakāmataṃ sāhatthikaṃ karotīti tapo karuṇaṃ saṃvaḍḍheti.
tika-s0519t:583_2: Paññā pariyodāpitā sāvajjānavajjadhamme pariggaṇhantī pahāsanipātato muditaṃ rakkhantī paribrūheti.
tika-s0519t:583_3: Upadhinissaggo pakkhando ninnapoṇapabbhārova sammadeva sattasaṅkhāresu udāsino hotīti so upekkhāvihāraṃ
tika-s0519t:584_3: Yena catukkena yassa rāgacaritādipuggalassa vodānaṃ visuddhi.
tika-s0519t:584_5: appahīnā ca paṭhamāhāravipallāsādayo rāgacaritādīnaṃ puggalānaṃ upakkilesā,
tika-s0519t:584_6: evaṃ paṭhamapaṭipadādayo bhāvitā bahulīkatā nesaṃ visuddhiyo hontīti vuttanayānusārena sakkā viññātunti āha “heṭṭhā vuttanayamevā”ti.
tika-s0519t:585_0: Atha vā purimāhi dvīhi paṭipadāhi sijjhamānā vipassanā attano kiccavuttisaṅkhātaṃ pavattidukkhampi saṅgaṇhantī
tika-s0519t:585_2: Tatiyāya paṭipadāya sijjhamānā sukhappavattikatāya sammadeva santatighanaṃ bhinditvā aniccalakkhaṇaṃ vibhāventī “animittaṃ vimokkhamukha”nti vuttā.
tika-s0519t:585_4: visadañāṇatāya ca samūhakiccārammaṇaghanaṃ bhinditvā sammadeva anattalakkhaṇaṃ vibhāventī “suññataṃ vimokkhamukha”nti vuttā.
tika-s0519t:587_0: Sappītikatāya assādāni paṭhamadutiyajjhānāni virajjanavasena visesato dukkhato passantiyā vipassanāya vasena “appaṇihitaṃ vimokkhamukha”nti vuttāni.
tika-s0519t:587_1: Tatiyaṃ santasukhatāya bāhirakānaṃ niccābhinivesavatthubhūtaṃ sabhāvato “anicca”nti passantiyā vipassanāya vasena “animittaṃ vimokkhamukha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:587_2: Catutthaṃ upakkilesavigamādīhi parisuddhaṃ susamāhitaṃ yathā paresaṃ,
tika-s0519t:587_3: evaṃ attano ca yathābhūtasabhāvāvabodhahetutāya sammadeva “suñña”nti passantiyā vipassanāya vasena “suññataṃ vimokkhamukha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:588_3: Āneñjavihārassa santavimokkhatāya aniccalakkhaṇappaṭivedhassa visesapaccayasabhāvato animittavimokkhamukhatā yojetabbā.
tika-s0519t:589_0: Tathā purimānaṃ dvinnaṃ sammappadhānānaṃ saṃkilesavisayattā kilesadukkhavītikkamassa dukkhānupassanābāhullattā appaṇihitavimokkhamukhatā.
tika-s0519t:589_1: Tatiyassa anuppannakusaluppādanena dhammānaṃ udayavayavantatāvibhāvanato aniccalakkhaṇaṃ pākaṭanti animittavimokkhamukhatā.
tika-s0519t:589_2: Catutthassa uppannānaṃ ṭhitattaṃ byāpārāpajjanena dhammānaṃ avasavattitādīpanato anattalakkhaṇaṃ supākaṭanti suññatavimokkhamukhatā.
tika-s0519t:591_0: Pakatiyā dukkhasabhāve saṅkhāre ñāṇasaccena avisaṃvādento dukkhato eva passati,
tika-s0519t:591_1: cāgādhivimuttatāya taṇhaṃ vidūrīkaronto rāgappaṇidhiṃ visosetīti purimaṃ adhiṭṭhānadvayaṃ “appaṇihitaṃ vimokkhamukha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:591_2: Itarassa pana adhiṭṭhānadvayassa suññatānimittavimokkhamukhatā vuttanayā eva.
tika-s0519t:592_0: Chandādhipateyyā cittekaggatā visesato dhammacchandavato nekkhammavitakkabahulassa hoti,
tika-s0519t:592_1: vīriyādhipateyyā pana kāmavitakkādike vinodentassāti tadubhayaṃ nissāya pavattā vipassanā visesato rāgādippaṇidhīnaṃ
tika-s0519t:592_4: vīmaṃsādhipateyyañca nissāya pavattā yathākkamaṃ aniccānattānupassanābāhullato “animittaṃ vimokkhamukhaṃ,
tika-s0519t:593_1: kāmasaṅkappādivinodano tapo ca vuttanayeneva paṇidhipaṭipakkhato appaṇihitaṃ vimokkhamukhaṃ,
tika-s0519t:594_1: karuṇā paradukkhāpanayanākāravuttikā dukkhasahagatāya dukkhānupassanāya visesapaccayoti tadubhayasannissayā
tika-s0519t:594_3: Muditā sattānaṃ modaggahaṇabahulā tadaniccatādassanato aniccānupassanāya visesapaccayoti tannissayā vipassanā animittaṃ vimokkhamukhaṃ.
tika-s0519t:594_4: Upekkhā ñāṇakiccādhikatāya anattānupassanāya visesapaccayoti tannissayā vipassanā “suññataṃ vimokkhamukha”nti
tika-s0519t:595_4: vācasiko ca vihāro “vikkīḷita”nti vuttoti dasseti “vividho hāro”ti katvā.
tika-s0519t:595_5: Tassa pana vibhāvanā idha adhippetā nayassa bhūmibhāvato.
tika-s0519t:595_7: Tesaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvoti tesaṃ āhārādīnaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvo pahātabbabhāvo paṭipadādīnaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvo pahāyakabhāvoti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:595_9: Vipassanā ca cattāro āhāre parijānantī tappaṭibaddhachandarāgaṃ pajahatīti ujukameva tesaṃ paṭipakkhatā,
tika-s0519t:595_10: evaṃ jhānādīnampi upādānādipaṭipakkhatā veditabbā tadupadesena vipassanāya kathitattā.
tika-s0519t:595_13: Vīsatiyā catukkehi visabhāgato vitthārena vibhattanti tīhi padehi saṅgahetvā kathikattā vuttaṃ “saṅkhepena dassento”ti.
tika-s0519t:596_0: Indriyānanti saddhādiindriyānaṃ. Dasannaṃ catukkānaṃ niddhāraṇāti yojanā.
tika-s0519t:597_2: Tato niddhāretvā vuccamāno hi niggacchanto viya hotīti.
tika-s0519t:597_3: Cattāro puggaleti “taṇhācarito mando”tiādinā vutte cattāro puggale.
tika-s0519t:597_4: Puggalādhiṭṭhānena cettha dhammo vuttoti āha “bhūmiṃ niddisitvā”ti.
tika-s0519t:599_1: “Vodāyati sujjhati etenāti vodāna”nti vaṃ netabbataṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-s0519t:600_5: Tattha sambhavo anuddesakkamena niddisane karaṇaṃ dassanaṃ payojanaṃ.
tika-s0519t:600_6: Yadi hi ime nayā uppattiṭṭhānavasena asaṃkiṇṇā bhaveyyuṃ,
tika-s0519t:600_8: Tathā hi vuttaṃ hārānaṃ uddesāvasāne “ete soḷasa hārā pakittitā atthato asaṃkiṇṇā”ti.
tika-s0519t:601_0: Yasmā panete mūlapadehi mūlapadantaraniddhāraṇena aññamaññaṃ te niggacchanti,
tika-s0519t:601_1: tasmā ekasmiṃ niddiṭṭhe itaropi atthato niddiṭṭhoyeva nāma hotīti imassa atthassa dassanatthaṃ “uddesānukkamena niddeso na kato”ti.
tika-s0519t:602_0: Idāni tameva saṅkhepena vuttamatthaṃ vitthārena dassetuṃ “paṭhamanayato hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:602_1: Tattha taṇhādiṭṭhicaritavasena dvidhā puggale vibhajitvā tesaṃ vasena nandiyāvaṭṭanayaṃ nīharitvā puna
tika-s0519t:602_2: te eva taṇhādiṭṭhicarite catuppaṭipadāvibhāgena vibhajitvā sīhavikkīḷitassa nayassa sambhavo dassito,
tika-s0519t:602_3: te eva catuppaṭipadābhedabhinne puggale puna ugghaṭitaññuādivibhāgena tidhā vibhajitvā tipukkhalassa nayassa sambhavo dassito.
tika-s0519t:603_1: niccasaññāya doso “iminā me anattho kato”ti āghātuppattito,
tika-s0519t:603_5: Yasmā pana lobhe sati sambhavato lobhaggahaṇeneva doso gayhati.
tika-s0519t:603_10: tasmā dhammādhiṭṭhānavaseneva dutiyanayato paṭhamanayassa sambhavoti imaṃ visesaṃ dīpetuṃ uddesānukkamena
tika-s0519t:604_0: Tenevāti tatiyanayato dutiyanayassa viya dutiyanayato paṭhamanayassapi sambhavato.
tika-s0519t:604_1: Evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānavasena āgataṃ nissāya aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dhammādhiṭṭhānavaseneva nayaniggamo niddhāritoti ayameva viseso.
tika-s0519t:604_2: Yadi evanti pāḷiyaṃ āgatappakārato aññenapi pakārena nayā niddhāretabbā,
tika-s0519t:604_3: evaṃ sante yathā puggalādhiṭṭhānavasena paṭhamanayato tatiyanayassa,
tika-s0519t:604_6: dhammādhiṭṭhānavaseneva dutiyanayato tatiyanayassa sambhavo dīpetabboti imamatthamāha “dve hutvā…pe… siyā”ti.
tika-s0519t:605_2: atthato labbhamānattā eva sarūpena na kathitoti attho.
tika-s0519t:605_3: Idāni taṃ atthāpattiṃ ekantikaṃ katvā dassetuṃ “yasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:605_5: Tathā hi “yattha sabbo akusalapakkho saṅgahaṃ samosaraṇaṃ gacchati,
tika-s0519t:605_6: yattha sabbo kusalapakkho saṅgahaṃ samosaraṇaṃ gacchatī”ti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:605_7: Ayañca atthoti “nayānaṃ aññamaññaanuppaveso niggamo”ti ayaṃ duvidho attho.
tika-s0519t:606_0: Ādito paṭṭhāyāti nayānaṃ aññamaññaanuppavesaniggamamattameva avibhāvetvā nayavicārassa paṭhamāvayavato pabhuti vibhāvanā dīpanā pakāsanā.
tika-s0519t:607_4: Idañhi nesaṃ aṅgadvayaṃ attakilamathānuyogassa kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:607_5: Natthi atthoti yo rāgābhibhūtehi andhabālehi parikappito diṭṭhadhammiko kāmehi attho,
tika-s0519t:607_6: so madhubindugiddhassa madhulittasatthadhārāvalehanasadiso appassādo bahudukkho bahupāyāso bahuādīnavo
tika-s0519t:607_7: savighāto sapariḷāho samparāyiko tathevāti sabbadāpi viññūjātikassa kāmehi payojanaṃ na vijjati.
tika-s0519t:607_9: Tena vuccati sukhā paṭipadāti tena mandakilesabhāvena tesaṃ puggalānaṃ akicchena sijjhamānā vipassanā paṭipadā “sukhā paṭipadā”ti vuccati.
tika-s0519t:607_11: Ime sabbe sattāti ime taṇhādiṭṭhicaritabhāvena dvidhā vuttā aparimāṇappabhedā sabbepi paṭipajjantā sattā.
tika-s0519t:608_4: ayaṃ paṭipadā yāya vasena sīhavikkīḷitassa nayassa bhūmidassanatthaṃ cattāro puggalā niddhāritāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0519t:608_5: Catukkamaggena kilese niddisatīti anantaraṃ vakkhamānena āhārādicatukkamaggena dasavatthuke kilesasamūhe niddisati.
tika-s0519t:608_6: Catukkamaggena ariyadhammesu niddisitabbāti tappaṭipakkhena paṭipadādicatukkamaggena ariyadhammesu bodhipakkhiyesu
tika-s0519t:609_0: Idañca pamāṇaṃ cattāro āhārāti imesaṃ vipallāsānaṃ pavattiyā pamāṇaṃ,
tika-s0519t:609_3: yāvadeva cattāro āhārā pariññaṃ na gacchanti,
tika-s0519t:611_1: Kiṃ vippaṭisārāti tena kilesānaṃ vītikkamavatthuṃ vadati.
tika-s0519t:612_0: Paṭhamena padenāti yathāvuttesu dasasu suttapadesu paṭhamena padena.
tika-s0519t:612_1: Paṭhamāya disāyāti tadatthasaṅkhātāya sīhavikkīḷitassa saṃkilesapakkhe paṭhamāya disāya.
tika-s0519t:614_2: Yesañhi saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ vasena satipaṭṭhānādīni sijjhanti,
tika-s0519t:614_10: Aggaphale arahatte satindriyañca paññindriyañca pāripūriṃ gacchati.
tika-s0519t:615_6: Samāhito hi saṅkhārānaṃ udayabbayaṃ pariggaṇhanto aniccasaññaṃ paṭilabhati.
tika-s0519t:615_8: Paññavā hi saṅkhārānaṃ avasavattitaṃ sallakkhento attasuññataṃ paṭivijjhati.
tika-s0519t:615_13: Evaṃ catuvipallāsappahāyīnaṃ catunnaṃ indriyānaṃ pāripūriṭṭhānaṃ cattāri sāmaññaphalāni catuvipallāsamukhānaṃ catunnaṃ disānaṃ pariyosānāni vuttānīti.
tika-s0519t:617_1: Amanāpikenāpi hi ārammaṇena vipariyesavasena lobho uppajjati.
tika-s0519t:617_6: Uppādalakkhaṇasseva pana gahaṇe “uppajjatī”ti na vattabbaṃ siyā.
tika-s0519t:617_12: Tathā ca vuttaṃ “taṇhāsahajātavedanāya pana lobho sahajātādipaccayehi ca paccayo”ti.
tika-s0519t:617_13: Evaṃ iṭṭhārammaṇe uppannalobhasahagatasukhavedanāya udayo idha “uppādo saṅkhatalakkhaṇa”nti vutto,
tika-s0519t:617_15: Vipariṇāmāvatthā ca udayāvatthaṃ vinā na hotīti sā taṃ nissāya uppajjantī viya vuttā “uppādaṃ…pe…
tika-s0519t:618_5: Dosajapariḷāhahetukatā jarāya dosabahulassa puggalassa nacirena jīraṇato veditabbā.
tika-s0519t:620_0: Alobhādīnaṃ paññādipāripūrihetukatā yathārahaṃ upanissayakoṭisahajātakoṭiyā ca paccayabhāvena veditabbā.
tika-s0519t:620_1: Sabbe hi kusalā dhammā sabbesaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ paccayavisesā honti evāti.
tika-s0519t:621_0: Ayaṃ tipukkhalo nāma dutiyo nayo saddhiṃ disālokananayena niddiṭṭhoti vacanaseso.
tika-s0519t:621_1: “Ime cattāro”tiādi puggalādhiṭṭhāneneva nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa bhūmidassanatthaṃ āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0519t:621_5: mandapañño ca sukhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya ca dandhābhiññāya ca niyyātīti dvidhā vuttoti.
tika-s0519t:621_6: Tathā taṇhācarito dukkhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya ca dandhābhiññāya ca niyyātīti dvidhā vuttoti dassito cāyamattho.
tika-s0519t:621_7: Tenāha “dve honti diṭṭhicarito ca taṇhācarito cā”ti.
tika-s0519t:622_0: Cattāro hutvāti sīhavikkīḷitassa nayassa bhūmidassane cattāro hutvā ṭhitā,
tika-s0519t:622_2: Tayo hontīti tipukkhalassa nayassa bhūmidassane ugghaṭitaññuādivasena tayo bhavanti.
tika-s0519t:622_3: Tayo hutvāti tathā tayo hutvā ṭhitā tayo katvā kathitā.
tika-s0519t:622_4: Dve hontīti idāni nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa bhūmidassane dve bhavanti.
tika-s0519t:623_0: Dasapadāni “paṭhamā disā”ti kātabbānīti nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa “paṭhamā disā”ti karaṇīyāni,
tika-s0519t:623_3: pakkhassāti anekappabhedassapi kaṇhapakkhassa saṃkilesapakkhassa atthaṃ saṃkhittena saṅkhepena paṭipakkhe
tika-s0519t:623_6: Dasa padāni dutiyakānīti taṇhādikā dasa koṭṭhāsā “dutiyā disā”ti kātabbā.
tika-s0519t:626_2: Satipi anavasesato rāge pahīyamāne anavasesato avijjāpi pahīyateva,
tika-s0519t:626_3: rāgassa pana cetovimutti ujupaṭipakkhoti dassanatthaṃ “rāgavirāgā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:626_5: Ayañca attho “āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimutti”ntiādinā āgatapāḷiyā atthavaṇṇanāvasena vuttā,
tika-s0519t:626_7: avijjāvirāgā paññāvimutti asekkhaphala”ntiādinā vevacanasamāropane āgatattā purimā anāgāmiphalaṃ.
tika-s0519t:626_8: Tañhi kāmarāgassa ujuvipaccanīkato samādhipāripūriyāva visesato “rāgavirāgā cetovimuttī”ti vuccati,
tika-s0519t:627_1: Tesūti “cattāri padānī”ti vuttesu taṇhādīsu catūsu mūlapadesu.
tika-s0519t:627_4: sabhāgato ca hotīti taṇhādīni cattāri dassetvā “tesu aṭṭhārasa mūlapadāni samosarantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:627_8: Nayādhiṭṭhānānaṃ nayādhiṭṭhāne anuppaveso nayānaṃ nayesu anuppaveso eva nāma hotīti āha “tipukkhalo…pe…
tika-s0519t:628_0: Alobhāmohapakkhaṃ abhajāpetvā adosapakkhaṃ bhajāpetabbassa nandiyāvaṭṭasīhavikkīḷitamūlapadassa abhāvato
tika-s0519t:628_1: adoso ekasuttakoṭiyā ekakova hotīti dassento āha “adoso adoso evā”ti.
tika-s0519t:628_2: Doso doso evāti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-s0519t:628_3: Samosaranti sabhāgato ca sabhāvato ca saṅgahaṃ gacchantīti attho.
tika-s0519t:629_0: Bhūmi gocaroti ca mūlapadāni eva sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0519t:629_3: akusale vā kusalo paṭipakkho anvesitabbo saṃvaṇṇiyamānasuttapadānurūpato upaparikkhitabbo.
tika-s0519t:629_5: So nayo niddisitabboti tathā anvesitvā tehi dhammehi disā vavatthapetvā so so nayo niddhāretvā yojetabbo.
tika-s0519t:629_7: imināva nayena mūlapadato mūlapadānaṃ niddhāraṇāti veditabbāti dassento “yathā ekamhi…pe…
tika-s0519t:630_1: Ekasmiṃ dhamme viññāteti taṇhādike ekasmiṃ mūlapadadhamme sarūpato,
tika-s0519t:630_3: Sabbe dhammā viññātā hontīti tadaññamūlapadabhūtā sabbe lobhādayo viññātā nayassa bhūmicaraṇāyogyatāya pakāsā pākaṭā honti.
tika-s0519t:634_4: Tameva hi atthato dassanatthaṃ udāharaṇabhāvena nikkhipati,
tika-s0519t:634_6: “Aññamaññasaṅgaho”ti idaṃ mūlapadapaṭṭhānānaṃ aññamaññato niddhāretabbatāya kāraṇavacanaṃ “sati anuppavese tato viniggāmo siyā”ti.
tika-s0519t:634_10: tadupāgamu”ntiādīsu viya pakāratthajotakanti dassento “pakārehi ṭhāna”ntiādīsu viya pakāratthajotakanti dassento “pakārehi ṭhāna”nti āha.
tika-s0519t:634_13: Tathābhāvadīpananti veneyyajjhāsayānurūpena pavattitattā saṃkilesabhāgiyatādippakārehi ṭhitabhāvena dīpetabbattā “dīpissatīti dīpana”nti katvā.
tika-s0519t:634_16: saṃkilesadhammādīnaṃ adhisīlasikkhādīnaṃ pavattanupāyatā anupubbikathāya sāmukkaṃsikāya dhammadesanāya dīpetabbā.
tika-s0519t:635_5: desanāñāṇassa nissaṅgavasena pavattagamanadesabhāvato paṭṭhānaṃ nāmāti attho.
tika-s0519t:636_12: Tesaṃ vomissakanayavasenāti tesaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyādīnaṃ catunnaṃ paṭikkhepāpaṭikkhepavomissakanayavasena.
tika-s0519t:637_0: “Tāni pana cha dukā”tiādinā padānaṃ gahaṇaparicchedato vavatthāpanataṃ vatvā parato “sādhāraṇāni katānī”ti
tika-s0519t:637_2: “Anuddharaṇe kāraṇaṃ natthī’ti vatvā uddharaṇe pana kāraṇaṃ dassento “tathā hi vakkhatī”tiādinā pāḷimāhari.
tika-s0519t:637_3: Vodānaṃ nāma saṃkilesato hoti saṃkiliṭṭhasseva vodānassa icchitattā.
tika-s0519t:637_5: tasmā “taṃ pana atthato vāsanābhāgiyādi eva hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:638_0: “Taṇhāsaṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ sutta”ntiādinā paṭhamameva saṃkilesabhāgassa dassitattā vuttaṃ “saṃkileso tividho…pe…
tika-s0519t:638_4: Tatra tatra bhaveti yadi vā kāmabhave,
tika-s0519t:639_0: Ekakacatukkavasena dassitabbāni padāni eva gahetvā āvuttinayadassanavasena missetvā avasiṭṭhadukavasena,
tika-s0519t:639_1: tikacatukkavasena ca itare aṭṭha paṭṭhānabhāgā dassitāti āha “tāniyeva yathāvuttāni aṭṭha suttānī”tiādi.
tika-s0519t:639_8: “Pāḷiyaṃ anāgatā”ti idaṃ sarūpato anāgamanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0519t:640_2: atha kho soḷasappakārānīti mūlagaṇanaṃ ṭhapetvā kāraṇasuttaladdhena saṅkhāragabbhena tadanurūpo yo gaṇanavitthāro,
tika-s0519t:640_4: natthīti yathāvuttapaṭṭhānavinimutto pariyattisāsanappadeso na vijjati yathārahaṃ taṃtaṃpaṭṭhānabhāvena pavattattāti dasseti.
tika-s0519t:640_5: Yadi suttageyyādi navavidhaṃ pariyattisāsanaṃ yathāvuttapaṭṭhānavaseneva pavattaṃ,
tika-s0519t:640_6: tattha kathamidha anidassitānaṃ gāthādīnaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyādibhāvo gahetabboti pañhaṃ sandhāya “gāthāya
tika-s0519t:640_7: gāthā anuminitabbā”tiādipāḷi pavattāti dassetuṃ “kathaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:641_3: yassa selūpamaṃ citta”ntiādinā idha udāhaṭagāthā viya.
tika-s0519t:641_4: Gāthāti aññāpi tepiṭake buddhavacane āgatā idha anudāhaṭā.
tika-s0519t:641_5: Saṃvaṇṇanākāle sammukhībhāvena “ayaṃ gāthā viyā”ti vuttā yā kāci gāthā “saṃkilesabhāgiyā”ti vā “saṃkilesavāsanānibbedhaasekkhabhāgiyā”ti
tika-s0519t:641_6: vā anuminitabbā nayaggāhena ñāpetabbāti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ “saṃkilesa…pe…
tika-s0519t:642_0: 90. Ariyānaṃ dhammanti cārittavārittabhedaṃ sīlācāraṃ. Ekantakaraṇīyassa akaraṇampi vītikkamo eva.
tika-s0519t:643_0: Avijjādike saṃkilesadhamme tadaṅgādivasena dhunātīti dhonā vuccati paññā.
tika-s0519t:643_1: Paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjanapaññāti pana pakaraṇena avacchinnattā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:643_2: Taṃ atikkamitvā carantoti paccayānaṃ apaccavekkhitvā paccayaparibhoge ādīnavaṃ apassanto iṇaparibhogavasena
tika-s0519t:644_3: evaṃ veḷunaḷāpi osadhijātikattāti upasaṃhārattho tathā- saddo.

tika-s0519t:746_10: Saṃkilesadhammānaṃ samatikkamena adhigantabbā vodānadhammā viyāti yojanā.
tika-s0519t:746_14: Tāsu maggabhāvanāya gahitāya vipassanābhāvanā gahitā eva hotīti taṃ anāmasitvā itarā dve eva gahitā.
tika-s0519t:746_15: Tathāpi “bhāvanābhāgiyassa suttassa paṭinissaggāyā”ti vutte kiṃ sabbena sabbaṃ asekkhassa jhānabhāvanāpi
tika-s0519t:746_16: paṭinissaṭṭhāti codanaṃ manasi katvā pāḷiyaṃ “asekkhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārattha”nti
tika-s0519t:746_17: vuttanti dassento “asekkhadhammesu uppannesu maggabhāvanākiccaṃ nāma natthī”ti vatvā “jhānabhāvanāpi
tika-s0519t:748_4: so paṭhamamagge sādhite caritatthatāya vipakkavipākaṃ viya kammaṃ uparimamaggānaṃ upanissayo na siyāti adhippāyenāha “upari…pe…
tika-s0519t:748_6: Tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ niratthakatā āpajjati paṭhamamaggeneva tehi kātabbakiccassa sādhitattā.
tika-s0519t:748_9: Evaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vādānaṃ yuttiabhāvaṃ dassetvā catutthavādo evettha yuttoti dassento āha “vipassanā…pe…
tika-s0519t:748_12: Vimuttiparipācanīyānaṃ dhammānaṃ paripakkatāya indriyānaṃ tikkhatāya ñāṇassa visadatāya vipassanāya balavabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-s0519t:748_13: So hi vomissakanayena saṃsaraṇako idhādhippeto “deve ceva mānuse ca sandhāvitvā”ti vuttattā.
tika-s0519t:748_16: Ariyasāvakassa taṃtaṃsattanikāyupapatti tassa tassa sodhanasadisaṃ kilesamalādianatthāpanayanatoti āha “cha devaloke sodhetvā”ti.
tika-s0519t:749_0: Saddhaṃ dhuraṃ katvāti saddhaṃ dhuraṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā.
tika-s0519t:749_15: Paṭhamaphalato paṭṭhāya hi yāva aggamaggā diṭṭhippattāti.
tika-s0519t:750_5: “visamaṃ candimasūriyā parivattantī”tiādīsu viya vā bhāvanapuṃsakanti etaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:750_8: tena nirodhasaṅkhāto vimokkho ālocito pakāsito viya hoti,
tika-s0519t:750_10: nirodhaṃ pana ārammaṇaṃ katvā ekaccesu āsavesu khepitesu tena so sacchikato hoti.
tika-s0519t:750_11: Tasmā so sacchikātabbaṃ nirodhaṃ yathāālocitaṃ nāmakāyena sacchikarotīti “kāyasakkhī”ti vuccati,
tika-s0519t:750_12: na tu vimutto ekaccānaṃ eva āsavānaṃ aparikkhīṇattā.
tika-s0519t:751_2: Yatheva hi antarāparinibbāyiādibhedānāmasaneneva eko anāgāmī hoti,
tika-s0519t:751_6: Ayañca anāgāmino tādisamavatthābhedaṃ gahetvā gaṇanā katāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:752_3: Kilesānaṃ vikkhambhanasamucchinnehi rūpakāyanāmakāyato vimuttoti imamatthaṃ dassento “vikkhambhana…pe…
tika-s0519t:753_2: ekacco puggalo ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā,
tika-s0519t:753_4: paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti,
tika-s0519t:754_0: Yaṃ pana mahānidānasutte “rūpī rūpāni passatī”tiādike nirodhasamāpattiante aṭṭha vimokkhe vatvā –
tika-s0519t:755_1: bhikkhu ime aṭṭha vimokkhe anulomampi samāpajjati…pe…
tika-s0519t:755_4: ubhatobhāgavimuttiyā aññā ubhatobhāgavimutti uttaritarā vā paṇītatarā vā natthī”ti –
tika-s0519t:756_2: Tattha yasmā āruppasamāpattīsu ekāyapi rūpakāyo vikkhambhito eva nāma hoti,
tika-s0519t:756_4: nirodhasamāpattiyā ca lābhīnaṃ vasena pañca ubhatobhāgavimuttā veditabbā.
tika-s0519t:757_8: pariyādakaphalānañca saha visayasaṃsiddhidassanena samasīsibhāvaṃ dassetuṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ terasa sīsāni vuttāni.
tika-s0519t:757_9: Idha pana “yassa puggalassa apubbaṃ acarimaṃ āsavapariyādānañca hoti jīvitapariyādānañcā”ti puggalapaññattiyaṃ
tika-s0519t:757_10: āgatattā tesu kilesapavattasīsānaṃ eva vasena yojanaṃ karonto “kilesasīsa”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0519t:757_11: Tattha pavattasīsampi maggo pavattito vuṭṭhahanto cutito uddhaṃ appavattikaraṇena yadipi pariyādiyati,
tika-s0519t:757_13: tāva pavattisambhavato “pavattasīsaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ cuticittaṃ pariyādiyatī”ti āha.
tika-s0519t:758_1: paccavekkhaṇavārā ca kilesapariyādānasseva vārāti vattabbataṃ arahanti.
tika-s0519t:758_2: “Vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ hotī”ti hi vacanato paccavekkhaṇaparisamāpanena kilesapariyādānaṃ samāpitaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-s0519t:758_3: Taṃ pana parisamāpanaṃ yadi cuticittena hoti,
tika-s0519t:758_4: teneva jīvitaparisamāpanañca hotīti imāya vāracutisamatāya kilesapariyādānajīvitapariyādānānaṃ apubbācarimatā hotīti āha “vārasamatāyā”ti.
tika-s0519t:758_5: Bhavaṅgaṃ otaritvā parinibbāyatoti ettha parinibbānacittameva bhaṅgottaraṇabhāvena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:759_1: Ettha ca yena rāgādhikabhāvena puggalo “rāgacarito”ti lakkhīyati,
tika-s0519t:759_4: tena appahīnabhāvena santāne thāmagatassa rāgassa balabhāvo lakkhīyatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:760_0: Sīlavantehīti ādisaddassa lopaṃ katvā niddeso katoti dassento āha “sīlavantādīhī”ti.
tika-s0519t:763_0: Aññamaññaṃ saṃsaggatoti “saṃkilesabhāgiyañca vāsanābhāgiyañcā”tiādinā saṃkilesabhāgiyādīnaṃ padānaṃ aññamaññasaṃsaggato.
tika-s0519t:763_10: lokiyañca lokuttarañca ñāṇañca ñeyyañcātiādiko sambhavanto paṭṭhānabhedo saṅgahito.
tika-s0519t:763_13: Yathārahanti yo yo saṃsaggavasena yojanaṃ arahati,
tika-s0519t:764_0: Tīsu piṭakesu labbhamānassāti tisso saṅgītiyo āruḷhe tepiṭake buddhavacane upalabbhamānassa vijjamānassa,
tika-s0519t:764_1: etena na kevalaṃ saṅgaho eva yathāvuttabhedānaṃ paṭṭhānabhāgānaṃ niddhāraṇāya kāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0519t:767_2: attano vā santāne pariyattisaddhammassa anuppavesanaṭṭhānatāya evaṃ vuttaṃ.
